name: Jessica Long
text: My family has been using Dr. Rider for as long as I can remember, 10-15 years at least. I absolutely love her and her passion. She is always willing to go out of her way even when she is not working. She has personally saved 3 of my animals, a few of my grandmother's cats and 1 of our childhood dogs. She helped me keep my baby girl alive for 20 years, until there was nothing she could do and my baby passed on her own, but I will say she did everything in her power to give me one more day. I would recommend Dr. Rider always! Her staff has been very helpful to us as well!!

name: Steve Geyer
text: Countryside staff is consistently courteous friendly and they really love Riley… or at least they’re really good at acting like they do🙂. We have been impressed with the level of care for our pup and professionalism of the staff. Highly recommend.

name: Dan Broadwater
text: Love the staff and the services they provide💯

name: Michael Dean
text: Under the circumstances with Covid, the practice is doing exceptional curbside business. We were able to wait comfortably in our vehicle. Thank you for the advice and taking care of my new family member.

name: Stephen Geyer
text: When we moved recently from the Atlanta area, we were concerned about finding a good Veterinarian. To our surprise we found a GREAT one. We highly recommend Dr. Rider and her team. A+++

name: M Stevens
text:
Countryside took good care of our beagle over a ten year period from pup until having to put her down due to severe medical issues. The staff is friendly, knowledgeable​ and compassionate.
We have been taking our rescue American Bulldog/Argentine Dogo to Countryside for the last 7yrs and our sons Black & Tan Coon dog recently from pup now going towards 1yr. We as a family appreciate so much the great care or dogs receive there.

name: Christina Strong
text: The staff is very friendly.   Dr. Rider is very loving and caring to my furbaby.  She takes time to explain everything!

name: Kelo Hunter
text: Love everyone at Countryside Vet, they're so helpful & really caring to my Bella!

name: Nita L
text: Everyone here is very nice! Good vet

name: Lexi Montee
text: Used to love this place as they were so accommodating and helpful. I called them about 8 minutes ago asking for help with a neighborhood cat that is extremely matted and needed to be groomed. Told us they weren’t our vet anymore and I’m guessing they’re doing this since we had trouble with them awhile back when my dog got extremely sick after boarding him there for a week. Wouldn’t recommend this place anymore honestly.

My wife and I moved to Auburn a little over a year ago and we needed to find a new clinic for our dogs, Lucy & Domino. A few of our friends had recommended Countryside and, needless to say, the level of care and the friendliness by their staff have always met and exceeded our expectations. Couldn't recommend a better place! Thank y'all so much! 🐶🐾

name: Linda McDaniel
text:
Dr Rider & staff are very compassionate about your fur babies & you as well.
Have used this office for 15 years & always received excellent service & care.
Highly recommend this veterinarian clinic for your fur babies.

name: Constance Smith
text: Very friendly staff. They all care about your animals instead of just trying to get your money. I've never had any problems with this vet clinic since I've been taking my pets there. Would recommend Countryside Vet Clinic to everyone that has fur babies.

name: Vicki Barnes
text: We’ve used Countryside for many years. We absolutely love Dr. Rider and her staff!

name: Jonna Threadgill
text:
Dr Rider and all of her staff are amazing!! They have gone above and beyond to help us provide for our local rescues at Woof Ave Rescue. Absolutely, LOVE countryside and I recommend them to EVERYONE I know!!!
Not to mention...all my own personal fur babies!!

name: Mary Dawson
text: Dr. Rider and all of her staff are wonderful! They are honest, open and upfront about your animal's conditions and prognosis. They do what is in the best interest of the animal and owner. They are also the best priced vet I've dealt with. I would recommend them 100%.

name: Tye Lott
text: Very professional and friendly people.

name: Paula Johnston
text: We have used Countryside several times to board our dogs and have been very happy with the care they received while we were out of town.  My daughter also had a pet ferret that was very sick.  We took it to Dr. Rider, since she also works with exotic animals.  Sadly, it had to be put to sleep, but Dr. Rider was so kind, caring, and compassionate.  I highly recommend Dr. Rider and the staff at Countryside Veterinary Clinic!

name: Jenna Reynolds
text: The staff and Dr. Ryder have been so great - welcoming, willing to answer any questions, and loving to my dogs. They love going to the vet. We've been going there for 3 years and have kept our dogs in the kennel many times. Definitely recommend Countryside for the price (VERY reasonable) and quality!

name: Belinda Doyle
text:
We love Dr Laura!
She looked after our sweet yellow lab Smoke and the sad day we had to say goodbye to him.
She has cared for our Smooth from her first appointment as a puppy and now she is a sleek beautiful full grown lab and Molly our precious tan and brown terrier rescue is flourishing.
She, her staff and associate vets have given us wonderful, competent and very compassionate care though the years.

name: Larry Keeble
text: We have been using Countryside Veterinary Clinic for the past 3 - 4 years and have been very pleased with all their services.  We board our Yorkie on occasion, had his teeth deep cleaned and have all his annual shots and other treatments completed there as well.  They've been really good to us and to our 6 year old Yorkie.

name: Sue Koons
text: I give Dr Ryder and staff an A !

name: Linda Lyon
text: Dr Rider and her staff are very helpful and understanding.  They will go out of their way to listen to your concerns.  The office is not "fancy" but the prices are good and the care top notch.

name: Frank Ware
text: Flexible, efficient, and - most of all - caring. Also, the location is not jammed into a congested area and has an outdoor grass area to walk your pets before and after their visit.

name: John Usman
text: The service here is wonderful. Dr. Ryder is very polite and she answers all of my questions no matter how dumb they are. The staff is very polite and courteous. I will continue to use this office, and have no reservations recommending Country Side to anyone. Never once did they try and push some expensive products. They take great care of my dog, and I am highly satisfied.

name: Ess Dee
text: Highly professional.  I think they care about your pet as much as the customers. My dog seems excited to go into the building whenever I take her.

name: Melissa Han
text: Very friendly and honest staff. It gets busy sometimes but that's always a good sign. There daycare system is great too. Always have an eye on my dogs and they make sure my dogs feel at home during the stay whether long or short.

name: Sarah Woods
text: I love Countryside! I was referred by a lady who saw my dog and I at PetCo. The staff is very friendly and appear to have love for the pets. My ONLY complaint was the wait time to see the doctor, which was about 20 minutes.

name: Kayla Loomis
text: We have been using this vet for almost 9 yrs. Ever since we found a mastiff puppy ate up with mange. They are amazing. They listen when you think you know what's going on, they are patient with the dogs (our hound has a lot of anxiety). We now have 6 dogs and all of them go to here. I will never use another vet as long as I get an option.

name: Carolyn Crouse
text: We have used this clinic since the 90's.  Love the care they give our animals and their customer service.  When we board our Cocker Spaniel for a time, she comes out happy and well taken care of.

name: courtney calvert
text: Countryside is the best vet we have ever used. Dr. Rider and her staff are amazing! They treat your pets like family and have always gone above and beyond for us.

name: Christopher DiStasio
text: Countryside has great people to help and costs are very reasonable.

name: V West
text: Dr Rider, and staff at Countryside Vet Clinic has taken great  care of our 2 dogs for years for regular visit as well as emergency visit. They were treated with TLC just as we would treat them as owners. They understand how important our pets are to the families.

name: Sheree Satterwhite
text: I can't begin to explain how wonderful Dr Laura and he staff is. She is not just a doctor for your fur babies, she is an lover of animals. She takes all the time you need her and she sympathizes with you on how you are feeling. I would highly recommend her as your vet.

name: Patrick Chandlier
text: The office staff was very professional and nice. The doctor did a fantastic job with my cat and dog. She was very informative and took a lot of time with both of my animals. Great experience.

name: Wendie Vann
text: Loved them!!! They were great with my dog!!!  They did not try to push products, to pad the bill.  I moved to Opelika 3 years ago, and had driven to Millbrook to use the Vet. I had used for years.  It was time to find a local Veterinary Clinic and I really liked Countryside.  Will go back again.

name: Debbie Keeble
text: We have used Countryside for about 3 years.  Our 6 year old Yorkie has stayed there while we are on vacation each year.  He gets all his shots there and has had some dental work done to keep his teeth looking good and helping bad breath too.  They have helped us with good advice on several occasions.  We are very satisfied  with our experience.

name: Karen Threadgill
text: Recently relocated to the area and Countryside came highly recommended. After 2 visits with 2 of my dogs know that they will be our new vet. Very happy with the interaction and treatment.

name: Paula Belcher
text: No long wait.  My dogs are usually cured the first time so I don't have to take them back again and again.  Love Dr. Ryder, the best!!

name: Stevi Kincade
text: Super nice staff, calmed my concerns about my ferret andd definitely gave me confidnece anad comfort as a pet owner.

name: Jennifer Manning
text: Dr. Rider and her staff are the best! They take care of all my furbabies on the spot when needed! Definitely recommend them to anyone, very trusting vet to take your pet!

name: Sharon Reese
text: Countryside is the best veterinary clinic in town. They take really good care of my max. He has been going every since he was six weeks old and they are great wth him. I really love the products that they use when they give him a bath it smells so good and I just love it.

name: Courtney Noblitt
text: Love this place!!! Been going there for years  and will continue to go. They're great with our animals and our animals love them!

name: shawnte webb
text: Best customer service. The veterinarian listen to our concerns about our puppy. Was very helpful in prescribing medication. They are friendly I love their service.

name: Nick
text: The staff is great and very accommodating; however, I must tell you my dog came back once with kennel cough and again with dandruff. Great place, but I just can't see myself going back.

name: laurelscarioni
text: Everyone was very friendly and took great care of my dog! Dr. Rider had my little guy feeling better fast and made sure I understood what was wrong and how to help him recover.

name: Cj Do
text: Staff is extremely nice and helpful. They took care of my guinea pig and he's healthy again! The only vet I trust with my babies! Definitely recommend going to them!

name: JoAnn Grier
text: I love this vet so much!!! I have a little Yorkie that suffers from flea Allergy and unfortunately he also has a bad reaction to any type of flea control. I live close to a dog park so it's a problem during the summer. I called my vet and of course they were not available so I called Countryside and they were so nice and said bring him it right away. I loved Dr. Ryder from day one. She takes up time with him and because I know my Little Man so well she really listens to what I have to say. The whole staff is so sweet and very professional at the same time. When I went to pay my bill I was pleasantly surprised. Dr. Ryder doesn't always make us come in to pay a dr's visit every time either. There has been a few occasions when they were able to call in some meds for him. I have seen the same vet for years and to be honest I wish I had been using Countryside Vet the whole time. I would recommend this vet to anyone who loves there animals, if fact I have sent several of my co-workers there. Thank you Countryside Vet for taking care of my baby and for loving him, almost as much as I do!!! :-)

name: DeAnna Hand
text: Amazing and helpful staff! They go above and beyond to make you and your pet feel cared for.

name: Wynter Bonner
text: Everyone is so kind and helpful.

name: Diann Holman
text: I always feel better after Dr. Rider checks out my baby. She takes the time to listen and has an understanding attitude of my concerns.

name: Daffny Pierce
text: We have been customers for Country Side Vet for over 15 years. They always take great care of our pets.

name: MR KIBBLEBITZ
text: Very pleasant helped my 13 year old cat feel better!

name: Michael Johnson
text: love this place. Best vet I have ever used. I drive  back from Atlanta to continue to see them.

name: Charline Parker
text: Outstanding care of my Cooper, Lola, and Khaleesi! Even though we are still curbside, Dr Rider and staff were exemplary in their communication, concern, and treatment of my babies upper respiratory infections. They even followed up to see how they are feeling on the medicines to ensure everything is working as it should. I could not ask for a better Dr and staff for my babies.

name: Jessica Bartlett
text: Wonderful! They are kind with our puppy and have very fair prices. Very happy we chose them:)

name: Jonathan Hallford
text: I love this place. They treat my dogs like they are one of their own.

name: Susette Urmeneta
text: Compassionate and personal care. Have been taking my pets there for nine years.

name: Ry
text: Such an amazing vets office the entire team is extremely trust worthy and very kind

name: Sarah Marshall
text: Dr. Ryder and her staff are absolutely the most caring team for both the animal pets and their humans.  She has been my vet for 15 years through 7 pets, loss, grief, and the wonderful world of pets.

name: Sarah Bridgman
text: There very caring and loving to my babies and looking forward to continuing using them

name: Syd
text: Did a great job declawing and neutering my kitten. Love this vet. Very nice staff.

name: Hayden Shaw
text: Went it and told them what's wrong with my puppy. They say everything is fine and take my money. Two weeks later having the same problem the vet said wasn't there. Repeat cycle of lazy vets

name: Bob Nelson
text: We've been with Countryside for over two decades.  Dr. Rider is very professional and is always willing to spend time explaining things to us.

name: Donna Perry
text: It was perfect, thank you

name: Joseph Smith
text: While out of Country we had a pet emergency, We had our Neighbor take our pet to be treated at Countryside Veterinary Clinic. We had the phone number written down with instructions to call if there were any problems with all 3 of our dogs. Dog was taken care of and it paid off to plan ahead. We've been taking our dogs there for almost 20 years.

name: Wanda Lilly
text: Have use Countryside Veterinary for all 4 of my dogs over 13 years. Great customer service and the doctor is awesome would recommend others

name: Ariel Ryberg
text: Love this place! Super friendly, very helpful, and to the point!

name: CoolSavage KidGamez
text: Always attentive to their needs with prompt, courtesy and informative information for our pets best care.

name: Tye Lott
text: Very professional and friendly people.

name: Michelle Brown
text: Very kind to both me and my dog Thor.  Called and checked up on him the day after we visited.

name: Jonathan Hallford
text: I love this place. They treat my dogs like they are one of their own.

name: Carla Blatt
text: I feel like Bently gets the best care ever with Dr. Rider and her staff!!!!!

name: Christopher DiStasio
text: Countryside has great people to help and costs are very reasonable.

name: MR KIBBLEBITZ
text: Very pleasant helped my 13 year old cat feel better!

name: Sarah Bridgman
text: There very caring and loving to my babies and looking forward to continuing using them

name: Laura Griffin
text: Awesome staff and great care of all my fur babies

name: Sue Koons
text: I give Dr Ryder and staff an A !

name: Deborah Lindsey
text: Excellent care!!!

name: Jackie Jones
text: it was great except I thought prices would be lower.

name: Carla Blatt
text: I feel like Bently gets the best care ever with Dr. Rider and her staff!!!!!

name: Laura Griffin
text: Awesome staff and great care of all my fur babies

name: Mary Page
text: Dr Lara and her staff are kind and caring!!!

name: John McDonald
text: I have lived in this area for 10 years and this is my vet. They offer great service.

name: Matt Ledbetter
text: Best in town!  5 star service!

name: Rita Kenney
text: They found out what was wrong with my dog and fixed her when the other vets couldn't. I'd highly recommend her everyone.

name: Lisa Martin
text: My cat HATES going to the vet, but this time it was different.  I won't say she is waiting at the door to go, but she was much calmer with this vet.

name: Shari Blakeley
text: best care for my furbabies.

name: Michelle Brown
text: Very kind to both me and my dog Thor.  Called and checked up on him the day after we visited.

name: Christina Bailey
text: Friendly to me and my pets. I always know my pets will cared for here.

name: Melissa Smith
text: Very kind and attentive staff.

name: LaTonya Maddox
text: Love the staff and services!

name: LoveJesus Amen!
text: Awesome job!!

name: Sara Byrd
text: This vet clinic and it’s staff are outstanding in every way. Seriously, if I could even begin to convey their kindness, excellence, affordability and professionalism in one paragraph, EVERYONE would be using them. The facility is super clean, great atmosphere and you never have to wait long to be seen. The kindness from the staff is like medicine for your soul, makes you want to go out and do good deeds and be happy! I leave there every time feeling equally as satisfied and happy as I do when I leave church. I know my fur babies are in the hands of some amazing people! The level of care and compassion is worth it, believe me!

name: Jacqueline
text: The staff is wonderful here! And Dr. Mahan is the most kind and caring veterinarian I have ever met! I have been bringing my fur babies here for many years!!

name: Dora Mahaffey
text: New to area with a sick dog and was pleasantly surprised by the rapid appointment.  The care and attention to detail was wonderful. EVERY person I encountered over the three days was friendly, helpful and professional. Definitely will use their services again.

name: Chaplain Marcus Allison
text: I am so thankful for the kindness that was shown to me and my beautiful cat, my little man, Jerry Christian from Dr. Dixie and all the staff. Although Jerry couldn't get better and had to leave for heaven Dr. Dixie was so compassionate to us it really helped. They also sent a wonderful card that means so much .

name: Adam Graham
text: I have been using Westside for over 10 years.  They are always very helpful and will get what you need done to your animals.  If you have a problem with a pet I suggest you bring them here.  Very friendly staff,  great with animals.  I have a rednose pitbull named Star!  They treat her so well when she comes if like she doesn't want to leave,  so trust me when I say they know what they are doing here.  They do almost all animals from dogs, cats, cows, horse, and many more so if you are looking for a great animal doctor.. please visit them and tell them that you were referred by Adam Graham.  Thank you for taking the time to read my article

name: Cassandra Gibbs
text: This is hands down the best vet in town!  They truly love and care about every single animal that comes into the place!  They are always friendly and professional.  When my dog had cancer they went beyond my expectations and treated him like he was part of the family joining in on the fight.  Zorro didn’t make it but he lived longer than he would have thanks to these good people!  I have always and will forever use this vet for all my animals ❤️

name: T.roy
text: Great service, friendly staff, we've taken both our dogs and horses here.

name: Jason Morris
text: Great customer service extremely nice employees

name: Danielle M
text: Just moved from FL to Arab and was lucky enough to be referred to this animal hospital! Our dog suffered 3 seizures out of nowhere last night and they got us in first thing this morning for care! Pleasurable experience from the very beginning starting with the lovely lady, Angel answering my phone call, so caring and efficient   in helping us get my dog in ASAP. Due to Covid19 their lobby is still closed, but immediately on my arrival I called and someone came out to greet us and bring us in the side door to avoid traffic. Dr. Lauren Ellenburg came into the room quickly and already had briefed herself with the information about my dog’s blood work from another hospital the night before. She is so compassionate, knowledgeable, and thorough with explaining what she feels needs to be done for your animal. She listens to you and doesn’t make you feel rushed! You can tell she genuinely loves her career and cares for the animals! Amazing is all I can say. She and her whole staff 5 ⭐️. Dr. Lauren Ellenburg answered my million questions and personally got on the phone to update me on my dog’s treatment. They don’t do any procedure without talking to you first and getting your approval and they’re so affordable (not like FL). She is so reassuring and sweet. We will be returning here for sure and highly recommend this animal hospital! Thank you all so much for treating our Oliver.

name: Kat Lopez
text: Thank You for always taking such good care of my babies! Y’all are just simply amazing!! Trouble Dery says Thank You!!!!

name: OTG 76
text: Wonderful open house yesterday excellent staff . The only place I take my kids aka pets!!

name: Barron Latta
text: I had a stray cat that showed up at my house so I started feeding him. After I saw that he decided to make a home at my house I took him to Westside to have him neutered and to get all of his shots and anything else that he might need. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I can't remember the attending vets name but he was great. The price for all they did was very reasonable. My cat looks and feels so much better. I am very happy with their service and will be returning as needed.

name: Kimberly Ferris
text: Dr Mahan is a wonderful vet to all of our dogs. She has helped us with many foster dogs also. We have been going there for almost almost 19 yrs.  Wouldn't think of going anywhere else.

name: Amber Rigsby
text: We love Westside! This is the only Veterinary office we will ever use. Our main Veterinarian is Dr. Mahan and I cannot say enough about how amazing she has always been. Yesterday I ended up having to take our cat up there unplanned. We saw Dr. Wilks & I couldn't be more pleased. He was so amazing, took his time, interacted with our cat and made sure to thoroughly go over everything. I would definitely recommend them every time!

name: Amber Wilson
text: Used this vet for all my animals. Set up payment arrangements and have paid it off several times. Even paid a bill for an animal that wasn't mine. Staff acts like I've never paid bill. What I don't understand is why the staff is acting in this manner.

name: Peggy Ashburn
text: They have been our veterinarians for over 25 years.  All of our pets have received excellent care from everyone there.  I would not dream of going anywhere else! We have also boarded our pets there several times and they are cared for just like members of the family.  They are simply Top Notch!!

name: Billie Ellen Simpson
text: This has been my vet service provider since 1999. Everyone connected to this hospital is dedicated to the care of both the pet and its owner. They are professional,compassionate,understanding and always willing to work with you to achieve the best level of care possible for your pet. I wouldn't go any where else. In my opinion they are the best in the area.

name: Gary Ferris
text: We love veterinarian Dixie Mahan. She has always gone over and above for our various dogs and cat. She is patient and willing to discuss all options and answer in detail any questions that we have. And the prices are much more reasonable than in Huntsville to which we live closer.

name: Sandy McDonald
text: We've been using Westside Vet for over 20 years, wouldn't use anyone else. It doesn't matter to us which doctor we see, because they are all so friendly, caring and patient with our animals, and don't leave us until all our questions are answered. We've boarded our dogs there a few times and never worry about them, we know they are taken care of and loved.

name: stevenjsmith
text: Multiple visits I realized they add certain things to your bill without asking the customer . For example I took my cat and four kittens up there for shots and told them that is all I wanted and they charged me for a feline leukemia test and told me they do it for all adult felines. After calling and asking why they did it the female over the phone hung up on me. This I not the only time they have added charges to my bill. I don't think all the people leaving these reviews are actually looking at their invoice afterwards.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Smith, we are certainly very sorry that you were unhappy with your visit. On Thursday, you dropped your cat off to be spayed and requested that she receive all vaccinations recommended for an outdoor cat. We spayed her and gave her a rabies vaccine, feline distemper vaccine, and feline leukemia vaccine. We did not test her for feline leukemia. It is not our office policy to test all adult cats. A feline leukemia test is $50. If you check your invoice, I think you will find that this procedure was not done. We make every effort to ensure that we follow the client's requests to the best of our ability. On Friday, your wife brought in 4 kittens for their first vaccinations and deworming. They each received a thorough physical exam, their first feline distemper vaccine, and a dose of dewormer. A 20% discount was applied to the vaccinations because you have 4 kittens. Your wife paid the entire bill at checkout. Angel was the receptionist that you spoke with on Thursday when you dropped off your cat for surgery as well as who you spoke to on the phone when you called back with concerns over the bill. Angel is one of our lead receptionists and does her very best to ensure that all of our clients are happy and their needs are met. Prior to this visit, you had not been in our office since 2016. Again, we are very sorry for any confusion and we wish you the best in finding future veterinary care. Sincerely, Dr. Lauren Ellenburg

name: Kileigh Bagwell
text: The best vet in town! The renovations are beautiful inside and out. Dr. Tom Ellenburg is very informative and caring.

name: joanna deatley
text: I absolutely love this clinic. I have used many vet clinics in the past but will never go anywhere else now. I have decided that even if I move I will still use this clinic. Dr. Mahan is phenomenal with my cats and remembers every detail about them each visit.  She always calls after visits and ensures that they're both doing well and to check if I need anything else for them.  The staff always remembers me when I come in for medication refills, to board the cats, or call with a question. I love the remodel and nee facilites now as well.

name: Joy Garner
text: I don't even now where to begin saying all I have experienced at this Vet hospital. ALL the staff and Vets are excellent! They have performed impossible surgeries on some of my animals that saved their lives. A local vet in the town I live in, performed a routine spay on my pet. The nightmare began. Her intestines ALL fell out on the floor. Westside performed emergency surgery and saved her life. I totally expected and was prepared for them to tell me she did not survive. I knew I was kissing her goodbye. No vet can top this team. I drive almost an hour one way to use this facility.

name: Michael Sypniewski
text: Best treatment you can buy for your loving pets in the area. Whenever it came to serious problems, this is the vet I came to. Best staff to deal with, period. They are a little pricey, but you get what you pay for here. They have the equipment that most don't have and they will go out of the way to find the issue. I had a doberman that got very sick and was having autoimmune problems. We had an issue finding out what was wrong and her not eating or drinking was making things worse. They had to keep her for a week and I was told that the techs actually went to a grocery store to buy sandwich meats just to try to get her to eat. All of the staff here are very caring and go above and beyond to care for their patients.

name: Carolyn J Bonin
text: I am a breeder with a large number of small dogs.  I spend a fair amount of time and a great deal of money at the vet.  Over the years I have used several very good vets in the area, but I am most happy with the care, the service and the prices at Westside Veterinary Hospital.  Whether it is routine screening or an emergency C-section at 4:00am, they never let me down.  I work mostly with Dr Dixie Mahan, but I also have a high regard for Dr Andy Wilkes and Dr Jarrod Harney.  The techs and the reception staff are also first rate.  All are knowledgeable, but also willing to listen.  Prices are always fair.  Good vet care is not inexpensive, but I never feel that money is the most important issue at Westside.  Their focus is invariably on providing the very best possible care for my dogs.

name: Tammy Kelley
text: Our family has been using Westside for decades and it's always a pleasant experience.  Everyone is always so kind and helpful.  Couldn't ask for better service.

name: Jonkristjen Eubanks
text: We would not take our pets any where else.  The staff are very courteous and we have always been pleased with the service.  Large or small, you can be sure your pet will not be just another patient, the WVH staff treat each pet as it is their own.

name: Marcia B
text: Everyone from the front desk back very helpful and friendly and go out of their way to make pets and "parents" feel comfortable and welcome.  Prices are reasonable and staff outstanding.

name: Ashley Green
text: We went on a week long vacation and boarded our very anxious puppy with them. They have made his anxiety worse by kicking the kennel doors closed on him because he was getting mad, we will never use this vet's office again. He is crate trained and house broken, so he should have been fine.

name: K McIntyre
text:
Take all my pets to Westside and have for over 10 years.    They have always treated them with love and care.

I was really impressed with the young Vet Tech who asked the same questions that Dr. Wilks did when he came into the room.  I don't remember her name but you obviously are on the right path

name: cindy lindsey
text: Always  kind, great  with both of our dogs

name: Ramona Mcmurray
text: I jus love Dr. Dixie an all the staff.you need a veterinarian ,then check out Westside veterinary hospital for all your pets.you will be glad you did.

name: Terri Needham
text: Westside Veterinary Hospital has the most loving, caring and understanding staff ever!!!! They have been my Vet for all my animals for years now, and I wouldn't have it any other way!! I panicked when my nosey little Lab got a fish hook stuck in her lip in the late evening, but one call to Westside and she was in the hospital, fish hook out, and I was assured she was fine!!! No more tears and Miss Dixie took such tender care of my nosey baby and me!!!!!! I would highly recommend Westside to anyone who loves their pets and wants the best care for them!!

name: Sandy Charest
text: I wouldn't take my dogs to another place.  They are the best.  One of the vets has even met me in the middle of the night during the power outages due to the 2011 tornadoes and saved my dog's life.

name: April Jones
text: They have taken really good care of my dogs. I would recommend them. My puppy was so sick then got an allergic reaction. They worked with us until we figured out the cause and they where very patient with us.

name: Janet Ricroft
text:
We have been using Westside for fifteen years now and I would not take my dogs anywhere else.  They have the best, most caring doctors I have had the pleasure to know.

Mostly I would like to thank Dr.  Dixie Mahan for being so caring to all my animals and very understanding of their humans.
J. Ricroft

name: Aaron Sumner
text: Westside has by far the best Staff and Vets.  They love the animals that are under their care, and are very empathetic to the humans as well.  They are well worth the drive from Huntsville!

name: Benny Pendergrass
text: they will take very good care of your animals and make sure you understand what you need to do to take care of them yourself when they leave there from their carrier and I also care about your animals that's hard to find

name: Elizabeth Smith
text: Love Westside Veterinary Hospital. We have taken all our pets there for the last 30 yrs. The staff is wonderful and so very helpful. Dr. Mahan and Dr. Ellenberg have always gone above and beyond for us.

name: Thomas Reese
text:
We have been going to this vet for years after leaving Huntsville. Our family has adopted many cats and dogs that wandered in to our lives over time. They have  always treated our pets as if they were a part of  their own family. The staff even calls to check up on them days after the visit. They have fair rates and don't put your pet thru expensive tests that often aren't neccesary. They.always inform you of all the treatment options that are available and let you decide.
They seem to be busy at times and they are growing. It's a smart idea to call first but even if you don't they always get you without much wait.

name: Jacob Bittle
text: We would like to publicly  thank and applaud this vet , especially dr dixie, for their excellent car of our dog rocker. Their ability and willingness to explain the how and why was fantastic. We plan to use them for all of our future pet needs.

name: Fred Hoffman
text: Thay have been great with our cat Samantha who passed on at 21 years, and with our dog Zack currently. We highly recommend them.

name: Holly Andries
text: They have always been there to help whenever I need them.  Always professional and curious.

name: Tom Dewille
text: I have a LARGE dog, the doctor (Harris)  came out to the car to  treat him instead of making me bring him in.  The service is spectacular and very competent.   It's a 45 min drive from my house and worth it.

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Dewille, for your kind words.  We appreciate your business!

name: David Dreitzler
text:
I have used the services of WVC for years.  They are professional and caring.  It is a great animal hospital.

Dave Dreitzler

name: andrea taylor
text: My Callie had a medical emergency on Thanksgiving Day 2016....Dr. Ellenburg met us at the office at 4pm and gave her excellent care and she is now happier and healthy!!!....The staff and Drs at this office are FANTASTIC!!

name: Poison Apple
text: Westside Vet Clinic is the best , I could not ask for better in the care of my pets , Patient , kind and loving ,Tom Ellenberg , Dr Wilks and the rest of the staff are knowledgeable and up to date on the newest medical procedures , medicine and preventive care and through in questions on medical issues , i have one pet that gets very nervous when we are called back to a room , Dr Wilks and Vet techs Rita and or Jess will take the time to calm him down and no mussel is needed , All the staff at Westside is awesome !! i will never go anywhere else !!

resp.text: Ms. Saint, thank you so much for your sweet comment! We really appreciate your business.

name: P. Lyons
text:
We love Dr. Mahan, she always returns calls at the end of the day, even if its after business hours and that means a lot to us.  The staff is friendly, clean rooms, prompt appointments.

The Lyons family, Arab.

name: Nancy Lockhart
text: Excellent care, just had two dogs spayed and they are doing great.

name: Debi Blackmon
text: Terribly expensive.  The same treatment and meds at 3 other comparable vets in the area are way more than half of what they charge.  We did not get a diagnosis/cure there either.  Just bandaids.

name: Jessica Ross
text: Westside Veterinary Hospital is the greatest vet I have ever been too, My Gizzmo got his eye knocked out by another dog and Mr Tom Ellenburg made sure we got took care of at 11:00 pm one night because all the vets around me would not see us. So now this is the only vet I use, Thank ya'll very much.

name: Liz Hardy
text: Dr. Mahan is the best veterinarian we've ever had.

name: Stephanie Mier
text: We take all of our pets to Westside Vet.  They have always taken really good care of our fur babies.  And our larger livestock too when we had them.

name: Steve Collins
text: What a great staff. They are pros all the way. Very respectfull

name: Dena Bedsole
text: Dr. Wilks is always thorough and great with my animals!

name: Beth Riley
text: In all my years of having dogs, this is the best Veterinary Clinic I have ever been to. The most knowledgeable, caring, loving doctors and staff ... they are the BEST !!

name: Dennis Buckmeir
text: Westside is the best friend Benji and Milo have.

name: Ronnie Hornsby
text: Great place to take your pet.

name: Greg S
text: They are by far the VERY BEST veterinary facility we've ever used!

name: valerie ball
text: Friendly staff, quick service, and affordable

name: Dawn Dyar (makeuplady)
text: Wonderful caring doctors.

name: Renee Eiland
text: They do it for the pet's not the money, my babies love their Dr.

name: Darlene Evans
text: Couldn't ask for better Dr's or staff, my bella luvs luvs to go up there..

name: Ellen Burdick
text: We trust them 100% with our fur babies!

name: Joe Watts
text: We've taken several of our cats to Dr. Ingrid over the years. She's always been caring and thoughtful--and gentle with each of them. She even sent flowers on the passing of our cats when they did pass away. But they got several extra years of quality life after seeing her.

name: Chris Wilson
text: I take my dog Xena here for the Underwater Treadmill. Leanne is wonderful and Xena seems to be improving after each visit!

name: Carole Waitzman
text: My dachsund has MANY health issues...He's lived twice as long as anyone could have expected due to the wonderful care he's gotten from Ingrid and everyone who works at Cardiac Evaluations...

name: Michael Lynn Bailey
text: Wonderful and compassionate team.  Our family has taken three dogs there over the years and they have received excellent care. Dr. Ingrid helped them live longer and happier lives.

name: Victoria Myers
text: My dog had a fainting episode a week ago, and our longtime vet treated him with a heart med. it wasn’t having the positive effect we had hoped and my little guy was coughing and gagging up fluid. So my vet referred me to Dr Ingrid for an echocardiogram. I called to set an appointment and a woman with pretty poor people skills told me it would be over a month before I could have an echocardiogram done on my dog. I told her I felt he was not in good physical shape and needed to be seen sooner. She told me I needed to go back to my vet or I could go to GA or TN because there wasn’t anywhere else in Alabama that did this. In other words take it or leave it, and tough. No empathy. No options. I have since found there are several other vet clinics where you can get an echocardiogram done. I am still upset over how rudely I was treated. Like everyone who loves their pet, when there is a serious health issue we don’t need rudeness. We are looking for help. I will never call this clinic again.

name: Rachael Daylong
text: These people are angels. Kate and Ingrid gave my dog a few more wonderful months to live in which she was in no pain and completely happy. Please, if your dog has a heart issue take them here. You will never regret it. When I had trouble affording medication Kate worked with me on dosages so we could find the most affordable combination. When my dog died Kate called the vet to inform them I was on my way for cremation. And a week later I received a card in the mail in which they made a donation in her honor to the Morris Animal Foundation. Please give this place your support. You and your dog will be better off for it!!

name: Frank Buck
text: 15 years ago, our 1st Sheltie developed an enlarged heart. We were extremely pleased with the treatment, both from a medical perspective and kindness perspective. It was a kindness that extended after our pet's ultimate trip to Rainbow Bridge. Now, 15 years later, our 8th Sheltie is a current patient and doing beautifully. We highly recommend Cardiac Evaluations.

name: Cozzy B
text: If your dogs passing out and needs immediate attention don't bother. Quote from reception...not enough hours in the day. Line those pockets...No compassion.

name: Kyra K. Russell
text: Didn't meet the team at the office BUT they did the Rabies clinic on 05/01/21. We arrived about 7 mins too late due to the health dept advertising it closed later.  The staff was friendly and took our 4 dogs so we get their vaccines up to date. I would definitely look into using their services for my dogs vet needs.

name: Jay Darran
text: Been a customer for many years. They are very helpful and considerate. Ment a lot to my family to receive a handwritten letter of sorry after having to put one of our dogs down.

name: Jessica Yates
text: Dr. Christie was so informative, addressed all our concerns and really took his time with our cat. Ms. Star was very sweet. Military discount is definitely a plus. Prices were very reasonable compared to our experiences with other vet clinics.

name: Courtney L
text:
3/10/21- My first review was from February of last year. Just like last time today was a great experience. Star was so sweet and asked how my other cat was doing since when they first saw him he was very small. There wasn’t enough time but I can’t wait to show her how big he’s gotten. Dr. Christie addressed all of my concerns about my female cat and I left feeling relieved. For a time he was temporarily closed and I took my cats to another vet which ended up being a very negative experience so I’m so glad he’s up and running again. They are wonderful people and I’m so appreciative of everything they do.

Just took my newest kitten here yesterday. My coworker recommended them because her family has known them since before she was born. It was a wonderful experience. All of my concerns were addressed and my little man got the care he needed. I’m from California but I’m not made of money and all the other vets out here gave me a bad feeling. They seem more about money and less about helping people. Dr. Christie and his wife are the opposite. They’re knowledgeable and really seem to love what they do and they worked with me on payment. I can’t wait to go back in a few weeks.

name: Darrell Gallmon
text: Doctors were adamantly rude & unhelpful after sending dog into hospital after being in their care. Our dog was in their car for hours & came home to a nasty rash due to being in unclean areas & near bad chemicals. Later that night we were forced to go to the animal hospital where we proceeded to pay hundreds of dollars for another evaluation & medicine to help treat the problems created by Town & Country. I will not be recommending this overpriced animal hospital to anyone

name: Holly Adams
text:
What happened to the days when Vets cared about taking care of animals instead of money.

We took our beloved cat Smokey Thursday Oct 29th at 7:00 pm to this Vet because our cat had a urinary blockage and the first thing they do is tell you how much the ER visit is going to be & the estimate of what its
going to cost.
The doctor stood there with his hands in his pockets saying that euthanasia was not a bad option, the tech had more compassion than the Dr.
So my husband & I had to make that awful decision where money made that option for us.
I will NEVER forgive myself for having this Vet make us make that decision.
We love our animals & you make us put a price on that love.
You people have this big fancy building & so I guess thats why its all about the money.
As for that Dr which I dont remember his name, that night was a blurr, should find another profession.
This incident has made me realize that I will never own another animal.

name: allie porter
text: I've lived around the US and have been to a lot of vets, and this is the best! Dr. Christie definitely knows his stuff and does a great job at explaining things and making sure your pet gets the best care. They also don't charge you an arm and a leg and won't try to offer anything unnecessary just to get more money out of you, like a lot of vets. Great place!!

name: CANDICE KRAUSE
text: DR Christie AND Star AND Monica  ARE MARVELOUS. THIS VET IS VERY DOWN TO EARTH AND WILL MAKE YOU and your PET FEEL WELCOME. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM!!

name: Mark Jackson
text: Unquestionably the best veterinarian around. I have brought my multitudes of cats here for years and I see no reason to ever stop doing so. Super friendly, very knowledgeable, and reasonable prices.

name: Brittney
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable. One of the best vet experiences I’ve ever had! I would highly recommend

name: Elizabeth Mcnamara
text: A place with a big heart!

name: Dionne Baggett
text: Love them. They are very caring, took time to check and find what was wrong not just a run in and run out office visit, called us to personally check and make sure Huck was better.

name: Jamie Hannan
text: Very caring staff and doctor.  Reasonable bill!

name: MAC
text: GREAT Vet and staff! Dr. Christie, Star and Monica are very fabulous and make you feel welcomed!

name: Gene Hawkins
text: Dr Christy was very knowledgeable and explained our dogs dental issues thourouly.  Very good bedside manner with our dogs too. We've found our new vet.

name: steven brashaw
text: Me and my wife just left from this place and we felt we were taken care of because the doctor took the time to get to know us and our dog.Not only that but he found out what was wrong with him gave us a medication and priced us a very low price at the end of the visit. Could not recommend more.

name: Ariel Keithley
text: Awesome vet for the circumstances we had to visit under

name: Carol Hunt
text: Great service. Really love animals.  Looks at everything and listens.

name: jimmy norman
text: Had my pet in and out very swiftly

name: virginia fehrenbach
text: Clifford love the Dr

name: Chris Helms
text: The grooming staff here is great and I would love to continue using them but the front desk staff that worked with my wife today, the way that she was spoken with, and the way that they constantly push vaccinations that our family vet doesn't require or promote is more than we can deal with. It's a shame because the facility is nice and the groomer is fantastic.

resp.text: Mr. Helms, I am sorry to hear your experience did not meet your expectations with Aubie’s visit today. We strive to provide excellence in pet care and customer service and take every concern and issue seriously. I have looked into what happened with Aubie’s visit today and left a voicemail for your wife. Please call me at 205-406-6794 so we can further discuss your experience in more detail. Thank you. -Brittany Rice, Practice Manager

name: Melody McCaa
text: The grooming staff is very nice and always does a great job with my husky, even through her term per tantrums. Had a mild procedure done here as well and my pup recovered in no time.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review Melody! We love when Morrow comes to visit us and appreciate you trusting us to care for her.

name: dena edgar
text: Dr. Vaughn is a wonderful veterinarian.  I have taken my pets to him all my life.  He is thorough, kind and extremely knowledgeable.  I recommend him to everyone.  The staff is also terrific and extremely kind.

name: Tracye F Jones Craig
text: The employees are very sweet and very careful with my dog Basil ❤️

name: Valerie Burnes
text: Dr. Vaughn is the best vet I have ever used.  He is thorough and is truly a miracle worker on tough cases.  As a dog rescuer, I have taken hundreds of dogs to him and have 100% confidence in his ability to correctly diagnose and treat a problem the first time.  The clinic is very clean and does not smell like dirty animals or urine, which is not always the case with other clinics.

name: chlaretta jefferson
text: Animal clinic is very nice to the pets

name: Juanita Hibbler
text: Max had a great experience at the Vet

name: Hobo Huck
text: I didn't go there. I went to the storage place across the street

name: BamaOutdoors
text: Friendly people! Nobody beats Dr Vaughan!

name: Chere and Mark Brown
text: They are great and take great care of your fur baby.

name: Tammany Coleman
text: All of my fur babies go to this vet.. the care they give to me is the best.. and they always know their names and mine... I’m so thankful for the vet and his staff.. the lady’s are the best with my fur babies..

name: Mattie Williams
text: It is THE PLACE to take your loved one.  The Vet and his staff are A-1!

name: Daniel Koehn
text: Thanks for being so kind to us and our animals.

name: Clay Elliott
text: Great vet clinic with a very knowledgeable vet and staff!

name: Seale Broughton
text: The place to go for the best pet health care in the area.

name: Deep Breathing and Jesus
text: Our most trusted vet.

name: Erica Criswell
text: Great care of pets

name: Lia Barnes
text: Wonderful people! Explained everything well and  very affordable.  They fit me in the same day!  Highly recommend!

name: Paul Alidor
text: Always helpful and they go out of their way for my little friends.

name: Nickie Stewart
text: The Doctor and staff were all very friendly and accommodating.

name: lisa perrin
text: Very professional and my dog came out happy, that's an A+ in my book.

name: Jayme Stanford
text: Best vet clinic hands down. The staff is caring and supportive. My puppy has parvo and had given up. He was dehydrated and unaware of his surroundings. This doctor rehydrate him and educated me on how to care for him at home. We are day 4 now and he is actively playing and barking, eating and drinking on his own now. I think we are out of the woods. I can not express how much I appreciate this staff.

name: Alyssa Starkey
text: The only place my dogs don't come back depressed from boarding. They are really quick with appointments, and very straightforward about everything. I feel like they really care.

name: L. E. Cowley
text: Hanna  and Kayla are the best

name: Michelle King
text: Wouldnt take my animals anywhere else. Staff is awesome! I have been taking my babys there for almost 9 years.

name: Alan Bodiford
text: Dr. Hastings an the entire crew at the Loxley animal hospital at absolutely fantastic top shelf staff.  I've been using their services for 15 years.

name: Mary Yates
text: They took care of our dog Noel in an extremely loving and kind way

name: rosewood
text: Very friendly place takes such good  care of my mom's little buddy Ben. RIP mother we Love you Always & 4Ever you will be truly miss!

name: Maria Mccsantos
text: The best staff and dr. Hall is amazing

name: Doris Potthast
text:
My latest rescued senior Chihuahua Jack had a swollen face on the left side. A bad tooth and an abscess were giving him so much pain . I called 5 animal hospitals around the area in Montgomery. Jack travels with me cross country in a semi truck. It's very difficult to find kind people who understand our problems. It starts with parking the rig and ends withdelivering on time.
Dr. Hasting took us in right after lunch. Late afternoon Jack had a dental cleaning, 3 teeth removed and his nails clipped, and he was back with his family in the late afternoon. How, that was more than I expected. Dr. Hasting and his assistant did a great job. We long haul truck driver never stay very long at the time at one place. Thank you for your understanding and help.

name: Sandy Lyons
text: Horrible experience. Came in with my puppy who was pooping blood. Had parvo and mange, they didn’t want to give me anything for mange yet. After her antibiotics were done she still had horrible diarrhea. Gave more medicine for it. I call after that was through and she had worms and they wanted to give an 8 day medication. Not once did they take her temperature or run tests of any kind except for parvo. No one even looked at her or would tell me what type of mange or why she had diarrhea. Never going back.

name: James Bates
text: Dr. Hastings in great, Hannah is nice too. lol Great place to bring animals. I understand he was a vet at Tampa Bush Gardens. Ask him for stories..... like WOW

name: Tracee Morrow
text:
My 22 lb dog was attacked by a 95 lb bulldog that was OFF his chain.
My dog was tethered to the ground by a trap he had encountered while parading around a dog in heat.
This made for a very bad ordeal all the way around.
Jobies jaw was broken in 3 places.
His canine tooth along with the 2 nearby teeth were snatched out along with the JAW BONE they were attached too.

These wonderful people took such wonderful care of him and us as dogie parents.he was in shock.
They acted quickly with shots for pain & to sedate him. An i v and watched him over night.
He was routed to a wonderful canine vet in mobile and is hapoy and healthy now.
Thanks to this wonderful staff at Loxley animal hospital

name: Metallica “Allie” Lorton
text: I love this place with a passion took my car in and they helped both them and the staff lets us know what’s going on directly and very loveable to all pets I would for sure recommend this place 100%

name: Carolyn Lampton
text: Friendly

name: Charlotte Dyess
text: They truly care about your animals

name: justin geitz
text: Great place to bring the pets 😀

name: Brenetta Goodwin
text: Awesome,very good place.

name: Cindy Sellers
text: Great veterinarian

name: William Scarboro
text: Loving caring staff, always very considerate of owners and the pets!!

name: Valerie Hajdik
text: I will not take my fur babies any where else.  He remembers the first time he saw them and that means a lot, not to mention that Dr. Hastings and Hannah  talk to you like you are family.

name: Jerome Lowery
text: Great experience

name: jessica t
text: Great vet

name: Jolene Cagle
text: My appointment was postponed due to covid.

name: Amy Weiss
text: They are fantastic at the Alabaster Banfield!  The staff took care of my Saint Bernard when she was sick with an unknown illness. They were able to point me in the right direction so that we could get her feeling better.  They are absolutely fantastic there!

name: Michele W
text: Our normal vet was booked/short staffed and my cat had an urgent care issue.  I was able to get an appointment at Banfield quickly.  I was greeted by a friendly staff, who politely recommended a few diagnostic items and the cost associated.  I was unable to afford all the recommended ones, but was able to get the ones we really needed to find out what was wrong with my cat.  They were in "drop off" only.  I left my cat and went shopping at some local stores.  Within a couple hours the Doctor called and informed me of the treatment needed and the costs.  While this pet hospital was more expensive than our primary vet, my cat received the treatments necessary for his injury.  The next morning, my cat was being his typical self.  The hospital did a follow up call the next day to check on how my cat was doing.  They were very friendly on the phone and shared sincere concern for my pet's well-being.  I will return to this animal hospital in the future if my normal vet is unable to see any of my animals.

resp.text: Hi Michele - Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We hope your cat is feeling better!

name: Grace Earwood
text: The facility and workers are so kind and go above and beyond to take care of our furry friends. However, I feel like I leave my dog here for a really long time each time he has a check-up; the process is lengthy. They did not get full rating because of this; and because their prices are through the roof. They are so expensive. The prices have gone up substantially since we first started going years ago. We have since left and are finding a new vet.

resp.text: Hi Grace, our aim is to provide a positive experience to everyone coming to our hospitals. We are sorry to hear you were not satisfied and would like to follow up on your experience with us. Please reach out to our Client Advocate Team at BanfieldCares@banfield.com at your convenience so we can try to address your concerns.

name: Hannah Pennington
text: I cannot say how grateful I was for Banfield today.  Our 14 year old border aussie has been battling cancer, but she quickly took a turn for the worse this weekend.  Banfield not only made it possible for us to be seen the day we called, but were exceptionally gentle,  respectful,  and helpful through the entire process of helping our sweet girl transition.  Dr. Kendrick was thorough, but also straightforward, a quality I value greatly.  The vet tech was so patient with her, even when she couldn't make it on the scale, and loss control of her bladder.  Akaya never had accidents! So this was just further evidence she was tired, her body was shutting down, and I refused to deny her the right to die with dignity.  Banfield made that possible! On a Sunday! With hardly any notice. Thank you.  From the bottom of my heart, thank you.  You wrapped her with grace and allowed us to lie her to rest peacefully on our land ❤

resp.text: Hello Hannah - We're so sorry for your family's loss and want you to know we are thinking about you during this difficult time. Thank you for taking the time to share your kind words about our staff. We're glad to hear Dr. Kendrick and the Alabaster team were there for both you and Akaya to help through a tough situation. We are thinking about you all.

name: Candis Threatt
text: Dr. Byrd and her staff are phenomenal! My sweet fur baby, Midnight Bella was seen by them on Monday for the first time. They are thorough, a lot of shots, scrapes, and tests done at a very reasonable price. We are now apart of the Banfield family as long as this great staff is there! Thank you so much for helping our fur baby!

resp.text: Hi Candis - We're so glad to have you and Midnight Bella as part of the Banfield family! Thank you for taking the time to share your positive feedback and experience. We're delighted to read that you had such a great first visit with Dr. Byrd and the rest of the staff and we will be sure to pass on your kind words to the Alabaster team.

name: FolaShade Thompkins
text: My experience was great. The staff was very friendly and thorough in explaining everything concerning my pet.

resp.text: Hi there - We are happy to hear that you had a good experience with our staff at our Alabaster location. Thank you for partnering with us.

name: Nicole Davis-Bryant
text: I love bringing my dogs here. They really care about your pets at the Alabaster Banfield Pet Hospital. They will even call and check on your babies the day after their visit, that shows me they care. ;-)

name: Karyn Hagan
text: The veterinarians and Techs are the best. They all take a personal stake in taking care of your precious fur babies..never a bad experience!!!

name: Marti Daniels
text: Love this place. They take excellent care of Beau kitty

name: Anessa Osborn
text: They are always so pleasant to us humans and take very good care of our dog.

name: Tammy Jones
text: I took my dog in Saturday after showing signs of UTI.  Andy was oh so nice and even took him out to make collecting a urine sample easier. I usually prefer a private vet, but was really impressed with the service and follow up I received. The vetenarian on duty was personable and patient.

name: Anthony Welshans
text: This is one of the best places to take your puppies too! They have the most amazing plans to help spread out the cost of the taking care of you new best friends

resp.text: Hi Anthony - We're so happy that you enjoy visiting our Alabaster hospital and that our Wellness Plan has been a good fit for you and your pet. Thank you for sharing your positive experience and for partnering with us for your pet's needs.

name: tcarr442
text: I have been taking my two dogs to Banfield Pet Hospital in Alabaster for 5 years. I have never had a problem and found that they will always work in a sick or hurt animal that does not have an appointment. Dr. Byrd and former Dr. Hamiliton have always been personable to me and I have never left feeling like I was rushed out and not taken care of. I have also recommended Banfield to a friend and he is also satisfied with their service. I would recommend Banfield Pet Hospital in Alabaster.

resp.text: Hi - Thank you so much for sharing your positive experience with Dr. Byrd, Dr. Hamilton and our Alabaster hospital! We're so happy to hear about the amazing care our staff has been able to provide. We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to the team!

name: Erica Robinson
text:
Although an employee of the Lake Mary, Fl location, I would like to take my time to thank the Alabaster, AL team for outstanding care with my boyfriends dog, Copper!

Prior to joining Banfields Optimum Wellness Plan, Copper had never been to a vet before. As an associate, I knew this had to change!

While on vacation I brought Copper in and he was diagnosed with Heart-worm Disease at his first visit and has now started his treatment.

Many times, clients do not understand the importance of preventive care, I didn’t even fully until become an associate. I try to stress the importance of these “basic” items daily during my workday, but just like my boyfriend, some people just don’t imagine it will strike home!

My advice as an associate and “person”, do preventive care! Get a wellness plan! The cost and your pets health will both benefit compared to the cost of treatment! Just as with Copper, this could all of been avoided with preventive care services covered under the plan!

name: Temika Carter
text: Every thing and everyone PERFECT

name: Andrea Jackson
text: I have been using the alabaster Banfield location for a few years now. Both my dogs see doctor Byrd, she is wonderful and so very caring! Always taking the time to explain everything, and treating my pets wonderfully. All of the receptionists I have encountered are always very friendly even when it is busy there and slammed. I defiantly feel welcome everyone I visit!

name: Katie McCombs
text: Always kind staff and knowledgeable.

name: Lauren Crase
text: Our dogs had been in for their well visits and 2 weeks later our puppy passed away due to unknown causes. I called Banfield to ask if we could bring her in to be cremated, and was shown absolutely no emotion whatsoever. My husband and I, along with our two small children, had to walk through the front doors carrying our sweet girl in a box. The vet saw us through the doors and never once came out from the back to acknowledge us. The receptionist was cold and barely said a word as I tried to compose myself. The most she said was asking for my credit card. We received no condolences at all. Most respectful vets do a paw print in clay or some sort of remembrance, but Banfield could obviously care less. When we took our one dog in for her next well visit, there was also never a word said about our other dog. Just surprising since most family vets are very personal and treat pets like people because that's their job. We will not return nor recommend them.

name: B L
text: They are a pretty good vet for check ups and whatnot. Usually pretty good about getting you a same day appointment

name: Katherine Pennell
text: I love the location in Hoover, but this weekend, my dog was supposed to get his stitches out and they flooded and we needed to reschedule for the Alabaster location. My husband and I both called separately at different times and the receptionist took our phone numbers and said she would call us back in 5 minutes... well it's now the day our dog was supposed to get his stitches out. It's been a day and a half and she never called us back. Not to mention, she was very rude on the phone and seemed like she couldn't wait to hang up. She had no intention of reaching back out to us. So now we have to wait until our location opens back up to get our dogs stitches out. I do not recommend this location as it seems they do not care about their customers... Which is the only reason they have a job; it's to care about/for customers. Imagine if we had an emergency and needed to bring our pet in. This location is not dependable and just simply doesn't care.

name: Bailey Lantrip
text: I would not recommend this vet!  NIKKI HAMILTON COX is a vet there that has a dog that belongs to someone else and refuses to return it.  They lied and said they had reached out to Kurt but they had not.  When we posted on facebook about this they lied multiple times then called him (finally) but instead of offering to give him the dog back they said "if he drops it they will buy him a new dog."  After they realized this was not going away they deleted all the comments and reviews about the situation.  GOOD LUCK DELETING THIS!

name: William Darden
text: My pet died. The lady at the desk was very nice. Dr Byrd was also very helpful and nice. They waved my Office visit under the circumstances that one of my dogs had just passed. I'll be going back from now on.

name: LJ Prevo
text: Staff is super friendly and helpful

name: witchysheep
text: Dr. Byrd takes a significant amount of time with each of our cats and is always mindful of their needs (as they're picky cats!). Not every receptionist is the best, but I usually end up working with one of the nicer ones (whose name escapes me). Our cats are on Banfield's wellness plan so we can take them in for free checkups whenever we please - we are always recommended to buy more expensive medicines, but aren't required to buy them through Banfield, which is nice.

name: Naomi Robinson
text: This is the only place I trust to take care of  my fur babies and do a awesome job. They are very loving and caring to the animals and are very helpful to the owners.

name: Lisa Dale
text: Friendly,short visit but seem very nice

name: Maribel Talamantes
text: Outstanding service

name: TheRealBamaChris 1
text:
I would never think of carrying any of my 7 dogs or 18 cats to Banfield Pet Hospital in Alabaster, Al.
Dr. Nicki Hamilton who is a veterinarian there has had a friend's dog that was lost from right across the street from Petsmart 10 months ago and now she will not return his dog. He's shown her pictures and videos of the dog but she says she needs to talk it over with her husband. Well that's almost been a week so he had a police officer who go with him to retrieve the dog but Mrs. Hamilton is now playing hardball so the police said it's a civil matter and now he must take her to court to get his dog back. Biggest problem is 2 days after the dog went missing, they posted a "Lost Dog" with reward on Petsmart's bulletin board and this employee never even looked or she just didnt care and wanted the dog for herself from day 1. This kinda thing should never happened and Petsmart/Banfield Pet Hospital Hospital in Alabaster should never employ anyone with such actions as this lady is pulling.

This will be shared and shared again all over social media.

name: Nikolai Krestinksky
text: Staff is disrepctful and just plain rude. All they care about is racking up your bill they dont care about your animals at all. Wouldnt trust them to take care of a pet rock.

resp.text: Hello Nikolai, We’re sorry to hear that you found some of the staff to be rude and disrespectful. We would like the opportunity to learn more about what happened. Please reach out to our Client Advocate Team at 877-500-2288 or email internet.inquiries@banfield.com at your convenience so we can try to address your concerns.

name: James Morris
text:
If I was able to give more stars,  I would! I really can’t thank the staff enough.

My baby was spayed on Saturday and did great. She started getting nausea and diarrhea a few days later, and not really wanting to eat. She did fine the first 3-4 days..but I took her back in and Dr. Byrd wasn’t in, so we seen the vet that was..he wrote some meds, and dog food. She still wouldn’t eat or take her meds so I  had to take her back.

Each time we have had to go in has been close to closing..and they’ve still given her the quality care needed.  I’ve never experienced any negative visit.  The front desk is always amazing and very polite, vet techs are super sweet (even if my auddie wants to fight the one), the Drs I’ve encountered have been above amazing. Each person that works here..treats my girl, as if they were her own. thank you Banfield Alabaster Staff!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive feedback about our stadd, James! We’re happy you have enjoyed your experiences, and we’ll be sure to pass on your kind words to the Alabaster team!

name: Ashley Shearer
text: Great customer service

name: Chris Martin
text: Do not bring your pets here. They are unethical. One of their vets refuses to return a little girls dog that was lost. Despicable.

name: Fred Daniel
text: Our Boomer passed away, we had already been in a week before, gotten all the expensive x-rays, etc. Then he passed away a week later, took him in to be put to sleep.  THEY CHARGED AN OFFICE VISIT FEE. Plus the cost for the cremation in addition to the keepsake urn. When I asked why the office visit fee, they said it was a corporate policy. Then I complained to the vet that saw Boomer and she said it was because it was a different vet who saw him and had to examine him. Really? That is a bunch of s=====!

name: Harley Rowell
text: They we so helpful and friendly

resp.text: Hi Harley - Thanks for your feedback!  We're happy to hear that the South Colonial staff was helpful and friendly.  We look forward to seeing you and yours again.

name: K K
text: I will not return. The receptionist was wonderful, great customer service very personable the reason I picked this clinc over others. But that's where it stopped. The vetinarian had very few people skills at all.. Maybe that's why she works with animals but they have owners -hello! We had to euthanize our cat.. the vet showed no emotion at all. Atleast show some to my 3 crying kids. We all have to do what we have to do... but please let's be human. I guess our cat was just another cat. Will never return.

name: Larry Robinson
text: I have an issue with this location of Banfield.   I cannot recommend them at this time.

name: Matt Trumbly
text: The prices are rediculous andnthe emotion the doctor haf was sickening will never go back do not recommend to anyone go to ur local vet a real vets office

name: Cashus Edwin
text: All I can say is this place will turn a sick animal away without seeing them. This place is sad

name: chris Kimbro
text: I would give zero stars if it were possible. Expensive, cold hearted, and evil.

name: PandS Lawncare and Maintenance
text: Awesome service Rachel is the best!

name: Mark Coombe
text: Amazing vet! My dog is very nervous at any vet and the vet made sure to spend extra time with her so our pupper would be more comfortable.

name: Andrew Johnson
text: Called to ask about a visit and was responded to very rudely

resp.text:
Dear Mr Johnson,
I’m so sorry about your bad experience. If you could let me know the approximate time this occurred it will narrow down who I need to speak with.
Thank you, Dr Beth

name: Katie Lynn Carpenter
text: I took my cat there because she was limping really badly one morning. The staff was pretty nice however, the Vet they have there is a complete idiot. She basically told me nothing, gave me some pain killers to give her, an expensive bill to pay and sent me home. She said that my cat may have been bitten but that she had too much fur too tell. I ended up taking my cat to another vet the next day, this vet looked at her, felt her leg and instantly found a huge hole on her leg, the size of a pencil eraser. I don't know why this doctor couldn't find that hole or shave her leg to find the hole, but she is just awful and should be fired.

name: Della Fuller
text: I had to ask repeatedly to see the boarding kennels that my pet was staying in. Every prior visit was under Covid restrictions, and no one was allowed in the building. Finally a tech allowed me to look thru a window. I had to ask for my blanket when picking up one of my pets, and my leftover food was not returned back to me. The charges were ridiculously high.

name: Susan Grace
text: All staff I encountered were so helpful and friendly. This is definitely my boarding choice when I attend the annual AKO reunion in Opelika. I know my sweet dog receives lots of TLC including the turn down service for which I gladly pay a little extra.

name: Fern Compton
text: Very helpful, specially how many times we had to cancel dates because our move dates kept changing. We appreciate your ability to help us. The animals came back happy and healthy. Thank you.

name: Shawna Bell
text: We were referred to Goodwin when we began to look for another  Veterinarian to work with our rescue, The Shire Rescue & Sanctuary, Inc. We are beyond pleased and blessed to have found such an awesome clinic. Dr. Faqua and the staff are amazing. I know that our seniors will be well taken care of here. I highly recommend other rescues to add them to their network of Vet services. You will not be disappointed!

name: Capricia Devoe
text: Our Pekingese is the first dog in our family and let me say Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort has been heaven sent.. all of my questions that I feel like I should know they reassure me and keep our baby in tip top shape!! My first experience in boarding they sent me pictures and updates daily.. I couldn’t ask for a better vet because they make us feel like family!!

name: Gayle Oden
text: My dog loves the Day Care. The staff is friendly. We also use the vet's there who are very caring and helpful in taking care of my baby.

name: Amy Jones
text: My fur baby loves going to their doggie daycare! They post pictures every day so you can see you dog in action too. He’s always so exhausted on the car ride home and is always excited to go again the next morning. It’s fairly priced and the staff is so nice. I would highly recommend them!

name: Erika Poikey
text: I've recently switched vet offices and now I'm SO HAPPY with my choice! Awesome service, on time, very consistent and explained everything to be very well. Highly recommend!

name: Rett McGowin
text: Dr. Katie, and Ashley, and the receptionist were awesome! Kudos to all!

name: Kristina Stephens
text: The staff is always so friendly and helpful. I travel a hour just to keep my dog with familiar faces who know his issues and take special care of him.

name: Linda Fuqua
text: Great professional staff and a very clean environment !

name: Mike Bradley
text:
Update June 2021. I am still happy with staff however I would definitely compare prices when it comes to over the counter meds.  I could of saved $60.00 by going with Amazon. Dasuquin $33.02 on Amazon,  $94.00 at Goodwin.
I find the staff polite and professional.  The staff truly seems to care about my dog.  I would,  however,  be pleased to see a report on how my dog faired during his boarding.  Did he eat? How did he interact with others?  For the money I spend on boarding a report would be appreciated.  Thank you.

name: Kris Lynch
text:
I can’t even begin to thank this Hospital enough.
We came in as an emergency while traveling for work.
Dr. FIelds met us in the lobby, and immediately made us feel at ease.
From the front desk staff, to the techs, to the Dr, everyone was so so nice !!
After an initial exam and xrays, we received the diagnosis of a torn ACL.
Dr Fields took the time to explain all of our options.
We scheduled her surgery the following Friday 7/5/2019
We drove 5 hours back to this hospital for her surgery !!
We dropped her off, I cried , they reassured me, and we left her in their capable hands .
Stephanie called me immediately following her surgery with an update and we returned the next morning to pick her up.
I’m so completely impressed with this hospital !!!
We will return with the rest of our pack, if the need should arise !!

name: Gayle Cowan
text: Hobo had a wonderful stay. Plenty of love and attention. Thank you! We will be back

name: Dominque Torres
text: Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort has been our vet family since 2015.  We have always appreciated the sincere kindness and professionalism of the staff, amazing medical care and outstanding facilities.  Most recently my two French Bulldogs were scheduled for grooming and at the last minute I asked if they could get their annual exams completed and stay overnight.  Aliyah was wonderful with arranging our boarding accommodations and scheduling exams and documenting information in their records.  I received two calls from physicians, one after their initial exam and she thoroughly explained everything to me and offered to complete dental cleanings for them.  She was able to get them scheduled and completed as soon as possible.  Additionally, they now offer a turn down service where my babies were provided a walk and cuddles in the middle of the night.  With service like this, I am completely at ease leaving my babies with the Goodwin family.  Thank you so much for the amazing job you did.  I genuinely appreciate it.  Sincerely, Dominque Torres, Mom of Weezy and Lu Lu

name: bill crowder
text: the people that work there make this a great place   we have been so happy with them    our 16 week old lab loves to go there     i would recommend Goodwin Animal to anyone

name: Tori W
text: Originally we took our pup to a different vet bc they also boarded. Recently I took a tour after hearing several positive comments about Goodwin & I was blown away! Zoe did my tour & was fantastic. She answered all my questions & concerns. I immediately booked my dogs next boarding reservation here. They have an indoor salt pool, which is also is solar heated in the winter months! That's right, check out my pics, you can see the doggie hotels from the lobby. They also have separate entrances for dogs & cats. The back play area has astroturf so you don't have to worry about allergies.

name: Tiffany Williams
text: The staff was very helpful and pleasant and assisted me with getting my pup all squared away for his stay!!!

name: Shannah Bonner
text: Always great service! My pet gets the best care at Goodwin, which is why I keep going back.

name: Brittani Franklin
