text: We take our dog Luna to the calera animal clinic and we love it! They always take such good care of her, great pricing and everyone who works there is so pleasant, I highly recommend them!

name: Anna Fasanello
text: We just switched from Calera Animal Hospital over to Pelham Animal Clinic and I have to say that the experience and quality is incredibly different between the two places. Calera never kept our animals records on file. We felt as though we had to reintroduce our pets every time we came in. We found out that our cat had a heart murmur once we took him to Pelham. It is a level 5 which means that he could have major issues if he were to go under anesthesia for surgery. Calera never caught this in the time that we were with them ( should have been found during a typical check up with a stethoscope). They also spelled our pets names wrong all the time. I will say, that when we got our cat fixed back in 2016, they were very kind as to call us after her surgery and keep in contact through her recovery. Staff was friendly for the most part, but we definitely did not feel close to our vet while there.

resp.text: We are sorry for your experience and we hope we can be better the next time you come in.

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to review our clinic.  All reviews are greatly appreciated as this is an opportunity to continue learning and growing.  We are hopeful that when you last visited our clinic a year ago that all continues to be well with your fur baby.  Please know that it is standard policy that all clients may request a doctor without issue.  As always to help with financial burden we offer combined service discounts, monthly specials and we also take Care Credit.  If we can be of any assistance please do not hesitate to contact our Practice Manager.

name: SGM Medders

name: Lizzy Carstensen
text: We were very impressed with Nall Daniels and with Dr. Clark in particular. They got us in right away and were very courteous. Our dog had to have a minor procedure done and everyone was great-from the receptionist to the tech to dr. Clark calling us with multiple updates. They were so kind and you can tell they really care! They were also very open about pricing upfront so we knew exactly what to expect.

name: Karen
text: I would never trust anyone with my fur babies but Doctor Daniel's and his wonderful assistant Brandon they are the best.

name: Jennifer van Arcken
text: I can't say enough positive things about Dr. Emily Soto, who we totally credit for saving little Otter's life. After taking Otter to multiple vets when he was ill and not getting better, a friend recommended Nall Daniels. Dr. Soto accomplished emergency surgery on a Saturday that saved his life. She was very concerned not only as a vet but sincere concern for his well being. She provided very clear instructions on how to care for him during the critical days following surgery. She called and checked on him daily.  He is doing great now! Thank you!

name: Douglas Beckham
text:
My wife and I are new to the high powered world of the  “working breed” of German Shepherds.  We recently purchased one, Ramos, from  Germany.  After about  6 weeks here,  he developed a case of bloat that could have killed him.  With bloat, the stomach actually "flips over" and cuts the blood supply off to the stomach, causing a rapid distension, and death if not treated quickly.  Fortunately, Ramos' stomach flipped back without emergency surgery.

Not wanting to go through this again, we researched bloat and found the best “cure” for it is a laparoscopic assisted gastropexy.  In this procedure the dog's stomach is sutured to the abdominal wall. The sutures eventually dissolve but the stomach is held permanently in place by an "adhesion" preventing recurrent "flipping".  Many animal hospitals do not have a laparoscope or the skill to accomplish this procedure.  Dr. Daniels was able to take care of this surgery and Ramos is 99% normal after five days. He has personally checked on Ramos 4 times on his own time since surgery.

Everything about Drs. Daniels and Clark, and their clinic and team  was strictly professional, yet courteous and friendly.  We can't forget Cassidy, the glue and the center of their clinic.  Exceptional personality and warmth!

If you are looking for a superior team to take care of your special “family member”, consider Dr. Daniels and Clark at Nall Daniels Animal Hospital in Homewood.

Not close enough for you? As Joe Biden would say, "Come on man!!"
This is not about closeness!!
It’s about quality !!!!!!!!!

Douglas Beckham, D.M.D.

name: Emma Pacey
text:
When I adopted my dog, the one thing the previous owner recommended is for us to take him to this office since he had been bringing him here his whole life and they "knew him really well". The first time I took him for his annual shots and a check up I asked about the small lumps on his body and they said it was nothing. 6 months ago I took him to this office to get a check up because we had some concerns. After paying hundreds of dollars for tests and x-rays, they assured me that there was nothing usual going on with my dog. This week he started getting very sick, and after a trip to a different vet, we found out he had cancer and it was very prolonged and caused other problems like anemia, kidney failure and lesions on his lungs. This kind of progression doesn't happen in 6 months. It happens over years. He had been coming here for years and they never once said anything about the cancer that was all over my dog's body and covering his organs. At this point, he was in too much pain, couldn't eat or drink, and could hardly breathe. The new vet and I decided it was best to put him down so he wouldn't be hurting anymore. After years of coming to the same office they never said anything remotely close to cancer.

There is nothing I can do for my dog anymore, but there is still something you can do for your's. DO NOT bring your animals to this office. There is no way a cancer this severe goes unnoticed for so long with an office that provides quality care. Find somewhere to take your pets that won't treat them like they treated my dog. I hope this doesn't happen to anyone else.

name: Quentin Collins
text: Always super friendly staff! Prices are comparable. Dr. Clark is awesome! Highly recommended.

name: Della Clark
text: Amazing staff. Only place I'd go.

name: Ryan Halcomb
text: My dog was referred here by my primary vet for a laparoscopic liver biopsy. The staff at Nall-Daniels was outstanding. They kept me updated on every step of the process and laid out a clear plan for the next steps. I was nervous at first taking my pet for a surgery at a place I have never been, but as soon as I started talking to the staff I knew my dog was in good hands. I would definitely recommend this place!

name: Lizzy Dee
text: They were so attentive and helpful. I got my cat groomed and a collar for her to wear when given medicine and they have kept up with us.

name: Jody Poe
text: Nall Daniels Animal Hospital is great! My little dog "Molly" was so well cared for there right up until the very end. She had to be euthanized on December 22nd, and everyone at Nall Daniels was so sweet through all of this. After Molly died, I got the sweetest cards from Dr. Daniels and Dr. Dunaway as well as from other staff. They even had a beautiful plant delivered to my home in memory of Molly. Molly always got excellent medical care at Nall Daniels, and they will definitely be my vets for my new little rescue dog that I adopted. I highly recommend Nall Daniels Animal Hospital.

name: Rocky Redding
text: They are awesome people! I have been taking my Pookie dog there for about three years.

name: Leigh Misso
text: Last week my little 10lb Dachshund was bit by  a copper head twice in our yard and Nall Daniels was WONDERFUL. They immediately took him back, got an IV started to counteract the effects of the venom, and monitored him very closely. Thru lots of prayer and the amazing Veterinarians at Nall Daniels, Gus was completely healed in 24 hours!  I would recommend everyone take their pets to them!

name: wendy roberts
text: I rated this place 5 stars at first. They did surgery on my daughter's dog. He ended up dead. They kept telling her he was OK over the phone. She called THREE times. They had 3 chances to say bring him in.

name: Tom Atkins
text:
In the year or so I’ve used Nall-Daniels I found them to be competent veterinarians, but based on exam costs I had begun to wonder if their prices were high.

So when it was time to have my pug spayed, I decided to get quotes from two of the highest rated vets in Homewood. The prices I was quoted by them were very close to each other... $250 and $260.  I then called Nall-Daniels for a quote. I was very surprised to hear an amazing price of $823. When they heard me gasp over the phone they quickly added that this was a worse case estimate.  I quickly thanked them for the estimate and moved my vet account for my 3 dogs to one of the two highly rated vets that gave me more reasonable estimates.

I wondered later what was included in a worst case scenario! A Heart transplant?

name: Nicole Harris
text: The staff was very nice and professional they gladly answered every little question i had

name: Kirk Atkinson
text: I've had four dogs cared for at Nall Daniels - they do an amazing job. Very friendly and knowledgeable techs, the vets keep our dogs in peak health and boarding is very convenient and economical.

name: Corin Thompson
text:
Nall Daniels has always been good to us. I've always been wary of local vets because they all have terrible reviews and it makes a lot of places look sketch. They have been willing and able to give us quotes for treatments so that we can make the best decisions for our cats based on our income.

Our cat Bubbles was diagnosed with bone cancer. The vet did everything she could to get the right diagnosis and give us as many options as available. They could not treat her there but she offered info for treatment elsewhere. We really felt that everything had been done that could be done. I definitely recommend this place 100%

name: Lorraine Donald
text: The dog referred to by Ms. Phillips was a dog that was given up to Adopt A Golden Birmingham with a sense of urgency.   Upon arrival to the clinic the dog had to be carried in and was recumbent the whole time and clearly in medical distress.   The blood panel showed that the dog was in end stage renal failure and to complicate matters was Heart Worm positive.  The medical team at Nall Daniels immediately relayed to Adopt A Golden Bham their findings and indicated that the dog was indeed suffering.  It was their medical opinion that the dog should be euthanized.  Neither Adopt A Golden Birmingham nor Nall Daniels Animal Hospital medical team take these decisions lightly.   We are in the business of rescuing and saving dogs.  Not making this decision and watching the dog suffer was simply not an option, as much as it devastates all of us involved to terminate the life of any of our dogs.   We have the utmost respect for Dr. Daniels and his medical team and are proud to be associated with their clinic and the "above the call of duty care" they give to all the rescue dogs that they have treated for us and will continue to treat.   We are all saddened by this.  Lorraine Donald Founder, Adopt A Golden Birmingham

name: Andy West
text: Nall Daniels has the most knowledgeable staff that we have seen in Birmingham. They are also the most caring group of people you will find and will put the needs of your pet first.

name: April L. Butler
text: Great service and techs that seem passionate about the animals, our pup seemed happy to go and not anxious when we picked up, as she has at other facilities.  Although they are a bit pricier than others, it is worth it for piece of mind.

name: Erin Laney
text: Wonderful Dr and staff all the way around!

name: Susan mcgriff
text: The girls in front are so sweet.. I use Dr Daniels is a very good person,surgeon..

name: Jean Lindquist
text: The service I received at Nall-Daniel Pet Hospital far exceeded my expectations! Nall-Daniel’s provides a variety of veterinary services including well pet check ups, grooming, surgery, and prescriptions. We went there for our yearly check up and vaccinations for our two dogs; a senior Golden Retriever, and a six year old mutt. The entrance was very clean and clam. When we got called back, we were in a decent sized examination room with a vet tech, I can’t remember his name, but he was a very kind and patient young man with brown hair. He was very thorough with us; he listened to and answered all of our questions. He even provided us with a printed out quote of what all the shots, the visit, and the treatment for the ear infection that our Golden had, before performing any procedures. Then, Dr. Dunaway came in to examine them. She immediately got down in the floor and started loving on the boys. You could see her passion for animal care when she came in the room. She was very articulate and detail oriented, laying out all of the treatment options for the ear infection and recommending medication for his arthritis, too. Her bedside manner was impeccable and I felt listened to and informed as she explained everything that she was doing. We never felt rushed, even as it got near closing time. All in all, it was a wonderful experience. I had called fifteen clinic before choosing this one. The reason I chose them in the first place was because they were one of the most affordable. Sometimes, affordability comes at the expense of the quality of care, but not here. I could tell they genuinely cared about the well being of our animals, and I think that we have found a lifelong vet! I can not recommend them enough!

name: Shocklemzoa
text: My little doggie got scratched in her eye by one of our cats. When I got home her eye was puffy and irritated. I immediately too her to Nall Daniels Animal Hospital. There was a major down pour of rain as I pulled in. As I walked in I was warmly greeted and told them what happened. Within a couple of minutes they were looking at my dogs eye and found a little scratch. They gave her some medicine for pain and put some other medicine in there to make sure there wouldn't be an infection. I could see my little precious was already starting to feel better. This is a wonderful place to take your pets. They treated my little doggie like she was one of their own. They even wiped her down with towels to get the rain off as she was shivering a little. Great service. Highly recommended. Thanks NDAH!

name: Keri Cartee
text:
Last week I had to make the difficult decision to put my sweet dog of 15 years to sleep.  I had recently made Nall Daniels my vet and had only needed to bring my dog in a few times before she died.  Although the prices are not low (comparable to other vets, but all are high these days it seems!) the care she received was excellent, the staff was very friendly, and every time I brought her in I received calls to check on her in a day or two.  When I brought her in a week ago, I knew it was probably going to be time to put her down.  She was suffering and could no longer walk.  The staff at Nalls Daniel couldn't have been more kind, caring, gentle, thoughtful, and patient with me and my family.  They made the process as personal and easy as it could be made.  They took good care of my dog and of me until the end.  They were respectful of me and my wishes during this heartbreaking time.
Today I returned from a luncheon to find beautiful flowers waiting on my porch in memory of Mini from the staff at Nalls Daniel.  I am overwhelmed at their kindness.  Thank you, Nalls Daniel, for caring for my sweet furry friend... and for caring for my heart today as I've been missing her so much.  <3

text: These guys & gals are great! Super friendly! We took our young pitbull puppy for his first exam. They were great. Puppy didn't even cry about his shots or worm test. They are priced affordably too. Bill came out cheaper than we expected for such amazing service. We will be back next time for his next round of booster shots.

name: Mindy Basquin
text: Always thankful for the amazing care our dog receives at MMAH! When she needed to stay for treatment over the weekend, we got daily updates on her health and demeanor. It was such a reassurance knowing she was in the hands of staff and vets who truly care both about the animal and the owners’ peace of mind!

name: Melanie Ward
text: A family member recommended this vet’s office based on their wonderful experiences.  I have loved everything about this office and their staff. My cat had a thyroid issue and later an eye tumor and, in both cases, Dr. Ware helped me through the problems with knowledge, professionalism, and kindness. My cat lived to be 20 years old and so much of that is due to their help. All of my coworkers and friends also use this vet office and all us are so pleased.

name: Miki O'Neil
text: Our Stella Grace is as sweet as can be, except for when it comes to new people...She is usually quite a "challenge" at the vets office. This was her first visit to see Dr. Puckett, and she loved everyone that took care of her , even Dr Puckett who had to give her shots! We would recommend Dr. Puckett and his staff to anyone who is looking for the best treatment for their pets.

name: Michael Hamer
text: As far as I am concerned, these people are superheroes. They were there for us during the worst period of our lives when our cat of 11 years got sick. We ultimately had to put her down and the kindness and dignity they showed both us and our cat was incredible. Now we are taking a new cat to them and that same professionalism and kindness is on display. Will never go anywhere else.

name: Eric Moore
text: I really want to like this place. The actual docs have been super nice each time I’ve been there and walked me through the whole process of having a new puppy very well. However, my dog will never return to this place again. I’ve boarded my dog here 5 total times. The 1st time she seemed skinny when I picked her up, but there was no way for me to know how much food she got because I dropped off a whole bag. Because of this I started measuring out exactly what she would need for each stay. The 2nd stay went fine. The 3rd stay was for 3 days, she was eating 6 cups of food per day, and I dopped off 18 cups of food. This time again she was noticeably skinnier, and they gave me back 6 cups of food, which let me know that they only fed her twice per day instead of 3 times like I asked. A whole day’s worth of food that she didn’t get in a 3-day period. I checked before the 4th stay if it would be better to do 3 cups twice per day to make sure she got her food, and for a 7 day stay, everything was fine. I just picked her up today for her 5th and last stay. She now eats 7 cups of food per day, so I told them 3.5 cups twice per day. The person that took her from the car noted that I still feed 3 times per day, but to make sure she got her food, she wrote 3.5 cups on the page. Again, she was noticeably skinnier, and I was given back 8 cups of food. They showed me the boarding page with a sticker that said 3 cups twice per day. I pointed out the fact that it said 3.5 cups on the other sheet. Even if they fed 3 cups each time, I would have received back 4 cups of food from a 4 day stay. Not 8 cups of food. I will never go back to this place and can’t ever possibly recommend for anyone else to go there either.

name: Rebecca Johnson
text: During pandemic, assistants come to car to pick up dog.  Never have to get out of the car.  Have been using this vet for many years.  Have great confidence in Dr. Puckett.  Office staff great.

name: Amanda Rials
text: They are so good with my Harry Cat!

name: Debbie Newton
text: Our dog was caught in a steel coyote  trap while walking in the woods.  I let them know she would be coming when I could free her.  They actually called back to check on us and were waiting outside when we arrived.  Great care.  They called the next day just to check on Haven.  They are the best!

name: Karlene Turkington
text: Caring, knowledgeable vets who will do all they can to help your pet and you.  Great support staff and clean, well-equipped facility.

name: Lindsey Gay Wall
text: They are so kind and always informative. Our puppy loves going with the techs that come to the car. Dr Lamb is so nice and caring.

name: Lauren
text: I have been taking my cats here for over 2 years now, and I have never had a bad experience. Dr. Poole and the other staff members are always so kind and knowledgeable. They are so sweet to my cats, too. I could never go anywhere else!

name: Steve Fulaytar
text: Good with my animal friends.  Even when I have to put them down.

name: Dani M.
text: The vets and staff are SO good, I drive about 30 mins just to take my dogs there - and I pass no less than 5 other vet offices on the way. We even have a new vet office opening less than a mile from our house and I will STILL make the trip to MMAH. They are the best in town!

name: Jade Halanych
text: Two of my pets lives were compromised because of this vet. The employees are friendly, and it’s ok for minor things like grooming or flea and tick. However, they messed up some anesthesia and sent a pet of mine into kidney failure, and also gave me misinformation that probably could’ve saved another’s life.

name: Raymond Kent
text:
Dr. Lamb and the staff are awesome and treated my little family member great. Couldnt be happier with the service and care of my K-9 family member. **addition/revision**
My 7 week old puppy had an accident, I called M.M.A.H. and was advised to bring him in right away. When I pulled in the parking lot, there was a staff member waiting to grab my puppy and rush him inside. After waiting a little, Dr. Lamb came out to give me an update. She advised what she found, what procedures were done, what measures were taken to stabilize my K-9 and what my next steps were. She advised that he needed to be transfered to Auburn Animal Hospital. She told me exactly where to go and that she was sending over his records and  everything she found and did today. Most importantly she gave me peace of mind that she had seen a lot worse and was confident with the round the clock care and oxygen cage at Auburn he would make a complete recovery.

name: Thomas Perelli
text: Beautiful service, they throughly enjoy taking care of your animal, every time I come up there with my lil cerberus they love on him and he's so excited to see any of the vet techs in grey scrubs. They are also very fast and thorough with the appointment.

name: George Lacey
text: Great friendly staff. Was able to accommodate a late day emergency.

name: Cheryl Corvo
text: Best vet in town! It's very rare to find a vet that will treat cats with the same care that they treat as dogs! I have both a dog and a cat! And they are always affectionate to both. They do a great job with reminders of certain vaccines and appointments coming up. They also Do a phone check in after your pet's appointment to see how they were doing after their vaccinations! I'm never disappointed with the quality of care and bedtime manners the veterinarians have there.

name: Roy Washburn
text: Easy to get appointment.  Short wait times.  Staff was great and truly cared about my pets.  Vets were not rushed and took their time both times I went (2 different vets) with our dog and then cat.  Also utilized grooming service.  Was competitive with other providers and was able to get vet work done at same time.

name: Courtney Moore
text: Dr. Lamb and the staff did everything with the upmost care and concern. They did a flawless job. They do care for your furbaby just as much as you do. I cannot speak more highly of any animal hospital.

name: Hayley Heath
text: Moore's Mill is the absolute best. They're always so kind and caring when it comes to your animals. I have yet to meet a single person there that wasn't sweet. Dr. Puckett is my go to vet there but I've seen all of them and all of them are super great!

name: Ella Turner
text: We travel from out of town to have our pup treated here and always have a great visit. The facilities are clean, everyone is always super nice and helpful, and the vets are so good with our pup when he gets anxious. We have been going here for 3 1/2 years and have never had a bad experience.

name: Jackie Waters
text:
Oh my goodness!!!  The best of the best from the front desk to the back door.  Dr. Ware and Dr. Puckett are so kind and take all the time
You need!!!  They recently treated our sweet 13 week old fur baby after he swallowed some rocks. Everything was explained as treatment progressed.  Bonus was our bill was very reasonable. Don’t hesitate to bring your babies to Moore's Mill Animal Hospital!!

name: Uiri Han
text: Love this clinic. So attentive and supporting.

name: Ashley Leslie
text: I can’t say enough good things about Moores Mill Animal Hospital.  My husband and I are eternally grateful to them for the outstanding care they give not only our own dogs, but the strays and rescues we have taken in for exams as well. Everyone on staff is exceptionally compassionate as well as accommodating. Despite being very busy and in high demand, Dr. Puckett is so thorough and caring. He takes his time to get to know you and your pets, and his attention to detail helped catch our dogs cancer very early.  We love this place and having them care for our fur babies is a huge blessing. Highly recommend to anyone in the area.

name: Javier Ferrer
text: They have a fantastic staff that truly care and give honest tips and help. Only vet in Auburn I will go to.

name: Chris Woodward
text: Best vet. I have ever visited.  Would recommend to anyone in the area. The complete staff are knowledgeable, courteous, respectful and attentive.  They will always follow up after the visit and send reminders when medicine needs given or refilled.  Can't say enough about this group.

name: Sara Klucking Phillips
text: I love taking my two dogs to Moores Mill because I know the vets there care deeply about their patients and they're always willing to explain or just talk with me. Their staff goes above and beyond and my puppy loves going in every time whether for a bath or shot visit.

name: Tony Mancuso
text: This is the best veterinarian in Auburn or Opelika.

name: Ruth Cope
text: We are new to this area and Moores Mill Animal Hospital was recommended. We had a great experience and know that Arlo is in good hands. I would not hesitate to recommend Dr. Puckett and this practice.

name: TIMETOBELIEVE
text: Outstanding pet care!!! Everyone here is caring. Excellent medical care. My Cat had a bladder stone removed . Dr. Puckett did the surgery. And was so great and very nice and personable. I really like him. They are very welcoming, warm and super caring. I highly recommend this veterinarian..

name: Eian Davis
text: Friendly and fast.

name: Emilie Letcher
text: Dr. Glen Puckett at Moore's Mill was recommended to me when my 12 year old lab needed his eye removed due to glaucoma.  Obviously this was a very emotional time for me.  Dr. Puckett was wonderful then & has continued to keep Maxwell is good health despite his many "issues".  I won't go anywhere else.  Have seen other doctors there, on occasion, they are all GREAT.

name: Sam Barbaro
text: The best family you can have for your pets and yourself. All of the staff is exceptional and Dr. Puckett is an angel on earth.. We live in Montgomery and I would never consider letting any other practice take care of our pets. Trust them with every aspect of caring for us!

name: Lauren Presley
text: MMAH is an outstanding Vet Clinic!! They have a way with making our pups feel super comfortable!! They're loving and kind and always have our fur babies best interest at heart! The staff are always kind and willing to help! Love coming here.

name: Lee Parr
text: Moore’s Mill Animal Hospital is simply the best. We have used them for years.  The staff and veterinarians are wonderful. They are compassionate, caring and always willing to listen and answer questions. Two thumbs ups for the entire practice!

name: Ann Beth
text: Will now be our go to for boarding our dogs.

name: Caroline Kyrklund
text: Moore’s Mill is so so great. Started at a different animal hospital and switched to Moore’s Mill. Dr. Poole and Dr. Ware have been amazing with my sweet pup. Always very patient & willing to answer my questions. When my dog got neutered, they were super patient with me. Highly recommend.

name: Jim Heptinstall
text: We have lived in 9 different states and have always needed veterinary services.  Moores Mill Animal Hospital, Dr. Glenn Puckett and the entire Moores Mill staff provide the best veterinary sevices for our pets that we have ever experienced.  They are smart, caring, enthusiastic, and resourceful.  The care they provide is well thought out and they offer their clients clear options and innovative ideas.  They understand the resources available in our area and use that knowledge for the benefit of their patients.  We would never use another veterinary clinic.

name: Roberta Jackel
text: Dr. Puckett is not only highly skilled as a vet but a compassionate listener.  He is also knowledgeable about other vet resources. Our dog, Cooper, continues to have great quality of life several years after his disc surgery.   The staff is always pleasant and helpful. We appreciate all of you!

name: Holly Hudson
text:
Dr. Poole showed a lot of compassion and helped make our very hard decision about putting down our 14 year old lab much easier. He was reassuring and comforting, as were the other staff members. He is always so kind and gentle to our other fur babies, as well as our human babies. :)
The office is always clean and well run. Never a long wait long during checkups.

name: Ray Beasley
text: Every single staff member is knowledgeable and professional, but they still make each experience casual and fun. You can see their compassion and know they truly love their jobs. From losing a pet, to getting 2 new kittens at the same time (I'm an idiot), we've always had a wonderful experience at mmah.

name: Alexa Cole
text: Since I've had my fur baby, we've moved three time and been through three vets. Moores Mill Animal Hospital has been the best caregiver to Graham. He LOVES his visits! The staff, Dr. Poole & Dr. Puckett are the absolute best.

name: Caleb Fischer
text: I love the staff here! Olive loves coming and seeing everyone as well! It makes coming to the vet fun and easy! When our sweet Olive broke her femur, the staff treated her like she was one of their own, and we are so grateful for that! As long as we are in Auburn, we will always trust Moores Mill Animal Hospital.

name: Cora Grigsby
text: Had an emergency with my cat they got me in the very next time that they could and helped make sure my boy was okay. Super friendly and great staff. This was my first experience here and I will definitely use them again.

name: Renna Suppe
text: I appreciate the people and care my Abby receives at moores mill !

name: Charlotte Bent
text: My sister has been telling me for a year to take Fox to Dr. Lamb at MMAH...I should have listened sooner.  Fox has trouble with indigestion, and we've tried lots of things,  but nothing really solved his problem.  I didn't think there was a solution, but after our amazing visit with Dr. Lamb, I have HOPE for a healthier future for my fur-baby.  What a great facility too...everyone was super nice, and the office is beautiful to boot.  We started his new feeding prescription this morning, and everything's looking better already.  Thank you Dr. Lamb and staff at MMAH!

name: Bill Dyas
text: All of the Doctors and Staff are Great!  My three children and their families also use Moores Mill. They know us and our animals and over the years we have become great friends. Thanks Moores Mill !

name: anne osburn
text:
Moores Mill Animal Hospital is the absolute best!  The Veterinarians and the entire staff treat my two dogs as if they were their own pets by providing expert medical care, as well as a loving approach to their treatment.
All of the pets treated by the doctors receive the most up to date care available.  The close proximity to Auburn University’s Vet School and the relationship which exists between the Vets of MMAH and the University’s Vet School add extra assurance that on all levels there exists no better care available for your pets!

name: Brittany B Lipscomb
text: I adore this vet and the entire staff. I have nothing but great things to say and I am so happy that I have MMAH as my vet. I can call needing some carprofen and pick it up quickly. Most of the vets know that I am well versed in cooperative care and dog training and are very open to me and my beliefs. I do wish they would allow me to watch blood being taken so I can help my dog's coping skills and though they say he is fine, it really is the only thing that bothers me because I am a firm believer that my dog should be comfortable at the vet however it is not a turn off and something that I would love to see implemented. Waffle and I love you all regardless.

name: Patton Scales
text: Incredible, friendly staff! Dr. Puckett is fantastic and really knows his business. They are all total professionals who really care about your pet and it shows. Impeccable service the minute you walk in the door!

name: Jo Ann Burkhalter
text: Receptionist was awful.  Dr. Lamb is amazing and made up for my bad 1st impression.  I believe that she could be coached not to yell things across the room.

name: Leslie Richardson
text: Moore's Mill Animal Hospital is the best! Millie and Charlie love going to Dr. Ware because she makes them feel at home. She is always so friendly and informative with all of my questions. The girls at the front desk are always helpful as well. The entire staff always make us feel welcome and I'm comfortable leaving my babies with them anytime :)

name: Rosalyn Shin
text: Dr. Poole is one of the best vets I've even taken my dogs to see. He is kind and professional. The staff is always patient and helpful. My dogs love going here and love the staff.

name: Tim Cadran
text: The team is knowledgeable, kind, and extremely caring.  I highly recommend bringing your pet to MM Animal Hospital.  They won't let you down.

name: Wendy Franks
text:
We've lived in several very large cities & our four-legged babies have always been blessed with good vets.  Auburn is no exception.  Dr. Puckett is THE best.
Other coworkers, including staff, could not be nicer.  All have such a caring attitude!  TY TY TY !

name: Sharon Potter
text:
Wonderful Vet Clinic.  All the staff is extremely kind, and helpful.
Dr. Poole is a fine Vet and so warm.  Dr. Karyn Ware is a Genius; and a lovely person.  Extra clean Clinic.  We are blessed to have this Clinic.

name: Hilda Young
text: Just prior to leaving for a vacation, I was worried that my little rescue dog had developed a UTI.  I took her in to Moore’s Mill Animal Hospital as a new patient, and they worked us into their busy schedule right away.  Chris, the vet tech, and Dr. Poole gave my girl a thorough exam and tests. I was able to leave the next morning knowing my dog was going to be fine and had no serious health problem.  I can’t thank the staff and doctors enough for their understanding and caring.  All 4 of my rescue fur babies will be their patients from now on!  Best vets in Auburn...

name: Aubrianna White
text: Very friendly staff. The facilities are very up to date and spacious so that non-social animals can be comfortably separated in the waiting room. My pup, Fitz loves this place. I received a call from one of the staff members “just checking on him.” I couldn’t have asked for a more informed and caring vet.

name: H J
text: All staff and Dr. Puckett made us feel so welcome. We had a great experience and feel secure knowing our dogs received the best care!

name: Jennifer Quillope
text: My dog Duke had an excellent first experience here! We moved to Auburn about 2 years ago and have been meaning to change vets locally. We love it at Moore’s Mill Animal Hospital! They took great care of his needs. 👍🏻

name: McClain Wheeler
text: I have had nothing but positive experiences with Moore's Mill Animal Hospital. All of the staff go above and beyond to make sure you and your pet feel comfortable.  I always receive a call within 24 hours after my appointment to ensure that my dog is doing alright.  Their services are also very reasonably priced.

name: Melissa Wills
text: Both my cat and dog children are so taken care of at Moores Mill Animal Hospital. My dog absolutely loves her vet trips! The staff is incredibly caring and helpful. So glad I found them after moving to the area.

name: Carol Lisenby
text: One of the best small animal clinics I've found.  The staff are helpful and friendly and I cannot say enough good things about Dr. Puckett and Dr. Ware.  Very little waiting time and exam rooms are clean and well equipped.  I recently boarded my two cats and neither were upset with me when I brought them home.  At other boarding places, my cats were visibly upset when I got them home. Good care for your pets and the doctors are available to talk to you if you have questions or concerns once you get your pets home.

name: Paul Casarona
text: Best Vet in a town full of vets.  We love MMAH!

name: Fiction Friction
text: The best veterinary care in Auburn. I've taken both my dog and my cat to this location and had a great experience both times. Helpful and friendly staff who really care about your animal's well being. Could not recommend more!

name: Mike Hubbard
text: Everyone at MMAC is always very professional and genuinely care about the well-being of your pet.

name: Lori Sadler
text: We took our new dog here for her spaying because it is the hospital Macon County Humane uses, our other dog goes to a different vet, but after our experience with Dr. Poole and Moore’s Mill, we will be switching over completely! It’s a nice, clean facility and Dr. Poole and his entire staff are nice and friendly. This is our go-to for quality vet care.

name: Chris Sarkowski
text: Great service and awesome doctors!

name: Mechelle Norris
text: I LOVE THIS VET. I was only a puppy parent in Alabama from January to July but during that time, Moores Mill helped me through everything. They never tried to break my pockets as a grad student and also answered my thousands of questions about anything and everything! Doctors were all very personal and understanding. After graduating and moving away from the Auburn area, I still haven't found a vet to match up to Moores Mill!

name: Cynthia Gibbs
text: Wow,  where do I start?   First , Dr.  Puckett is a great doctor.   He was so kind and gentle with Angel.   Second. He was always friendly and ready to listen.  He never rushed me.   Lastly,  the staff is so nice and helpful.   I would and do still recommend them.

name: Connie Spates
text: Very professional service and always a special place for sweet service with my animals!

name: Renee VanRiper
text: Dr. Ware and the staff have been wonderful, responsive, and compassionate. Dr. Ware is very knowledgeable and eager to help. The facility is very clean and modern. My sweet doggie is usually very timid at vet offices but she seemed very comfortable which speaks volumes. I highly recommend Moores Mill Animal Hospital.

name: Austin Robinson
text: Service was excellent and Dr. Poole was very honest and understanding about our dog's injury

name: Leigh Clark
text: Professional,  kind and super sweet to humans and animals!

name: rstark89051
text: Moores Mill Animal Hospital loved our big guy Titan (German Shepherd) like he was their own!  There was never a situation where they were not there for us, never forgetting our names or to follow up with a phone call or to suggest something that might be helpful to us.  We are going to miss the doctors and all the staff terribly, and have serious doubts that we will ever find another Vet Clinic like them again!

name: Lesia Smith
text: I have been very happy at Moores Mill Animal Hospital.  They are always friendly.  I never have a long wait.  They are gentle with my pet.  Their prices are reasonable.  They even helped me late one evening when my dog had been bitten by a snake.  I will always return to them.

name: Morgan Pendergrass
text: We absolutely LOVE Moore's Mill Animal hospital!  Dr. Puckett and the rest of the staff always go the extra mile to make sure our pets are cared for and doing well.  They go above and beyond the call of duty, answering texts and emails well past business hours, to give us the peace of mind we need when our fur babies are sick.  I only wish there were more stars to give!

name: Dawn Bradfield
text: First time coming here and the staff were very friendly and patient.  Dr was very patient and spent a lot of time w/my dog who was very timid in the beginning.  Shared personal stories of his pets and was very helpful in explaining techniques for training.

name: Patrick Slattery
text: Moores Mill Animal Hospital has been serving the needs of my pets for about ten years. I have experienced only a warm and caring setting with the needs of my pets always being dealt with in a professional and competent manner. I give them a 5-star review.

name: aileene goodner
text: We have had the best experience with all of the doctors and staff at Moore’s Mill. They know our pets and love on them every time we go in. Very professional but also  completely down to earth. Love them!

name: Ashley Wood
text: I couldn’t ask for a more caring, knowledgeable, and kind staff to care for my Stewart. They go above and beyond. I’m grateful for the treatment they provide. They encompass more than what can be taught...compassion, kindness, and understanding.

name: Mike Davenport
text: Dr. Ware and Dr. Puckett are skilled surgeons and diagnosticians. They also are very caring and committed to communicating results of my pet's tests.

name: Diane Peterson
text:
Everyone is always so good with our dog, Abe.  He is afraid of most people since he is an older rescue.  They are patient and respectful to him.

The doctors take care to explain everything to me and to keep track of Abe.

Also, I feel good about kenneling Abe with Moore's Mill Animal Hospital.  They know him, they call me if anything at all comes up, and Abe always knows I will come back and get him from them.

name: Merideth D
text: Wonderful place to take your fur babies! I can leave our pets here and know they will be taken care of. Such peace of mind knowing we have a great team of veterinarians taking care of our pups!

name: Tate Hall
text: Moores Mill is THE BEST!! They helped me so much with my new puppy and answered all of my questions. I never had to wait more than 5 minutes to see the doctor and she and the vet techs truly care about my sweet pup!!

name: Jake Kang
text: Few weeks ago, I had let go of my dog which is age of 14. and this vet gave my dog peaceful end. They were polite and professional. Ty for everything

name: Jamie Burnett
text: We love Dr. Puckett and his staff.  They were always friendly and took great care our our sweet Petey.  He had epilepsy so we were at the vet A LOT!  I highly recommend Dr. Puckett.

name: Megan Phillips
text: The Veterinarians are very thorough and knowledgeable. We brought our new puppy here for his 1st vaccinations and loved the entire staff! We will be bringing our other dog and cat here, as well.

name: Kassie Mink
text: My pup and I have been going here for over a year. We have seen Dr. Puckett and Dr. Poole, and my baby just loves them both. Great staff, always incredibly friendly and helpful. Love them.

name: Sarah Brown
text: Such a special place! They handled our difficult time (as we said goodbye to our cat) recently with such kindness and professionalism.  Even our dog is a fan of Moores Mill Animal Clinic!

name: Zac Day
text:
I have taken my dogs to Moores Mill and Dr. Puckett for seven years now. We started going here when we lived in Auburn. We have since moved back to Columbus. Dr. Puckett and his staff have made it an easy choice to continue driving back and forth.

The staff may have turned over a few times here and there because of all the college students, but Dr. Puckett always hires the right people. Always trustworthy, compassionate, and understanding.

We have boarded our dogs here several times before. They are quick to call and discuss with you if anything happens or concerns them about your pets.

Dr. Puckett and Moores Mill will always have my recommendation.

name: Krista Allison
text: I am blown away by how kind, efficient, and knowledgeable the staff at Moore's Mill is. You know it is a good practice when the receptionist and vet give you the same information and remain that consistent in their advice. The staff are kind and flow patients in and out very well, I felt like the vets really listened to me, and I feel like everyone there is interested in what's best for my pets. Thank you guys.

name: Sharlene McDaniel
text: My dogs are like children to me. They’re part of my family and Moores’s Mill Animal Hospital treats them with all the love and respect I could ever expect. They are professional and knowledgeable. I completely trust them to care for my pets!

name: Emily Peters
text: They are all so sweet there and so accommodating !!! they treat my puppy like the little prince they is! they treated all his ailments, despite being told he was fine by the vet I originally started with... needless to say we are sticking with them. Absolutely wonderful vets!!

name: Seho Lee
text: Staffs are all kind

name: Lauren Jones
text: Knowledgeable, caring, friendly—I know my pets are loved and well-taken care of at Moore’s Mill Animal Hospital. Dr. Puckett, Dr. Ware, Dr. Poole, and the entire staff are wonderful. I appreciate the way they patiently tolerate us overbearing fur-parents as well. 😂

name: Melanie Paris
text: MMAH holds such a special place in my heart!  Not only do they love our pets, but they also see to it that the owners are well informed and comforted if necessary.  I recently had to let go of my precious Huck.  It was sudden.  It was awful. But from the moment we walked in the door through the entire experience (being sent to AU Vet Clinic), they were informative, thorough, compassionate, caring, and most importantly AVAILABLE.  It was a weekend yet they were just an email/phone call away with our questions and to help make that transition as smooth as possible.  As if that weren't enough, they sent us a sympathy card with a short hand-written note by each person in the office.  SERIOUSLY??!?!! In the world of technology, who takes the time to write heartfelt sympathy notes anymore??  MMAH does.  Bottom line...they love our pets.  They love us. And we love them.  It's a family.

name: Kay Lyn
text: I am so glad I chose this vet's office for my special boy. He is an extremely nervous dog. I said that he was nervous when making his appointment so they intentionally scheduled extra time for him. They sat in the floor and fed him treats until he got comfortable and did the exam in the floor. They went above and beyond to answer all of my many many questions. He eventually was letting them pet him and going up to them. I am absolutely blown away. Everything was very clean and the lady at the front desk was super sweet and helpful. I have no complaints whatsoever.

name: Tracy McDaniel
text: Love everything about them! Great vets, friendly staff, nice clinic! They love my Lucy like she’s their own. :)

name: Elizabeth Garrett
text: I recommend Moores Mill Animal Hospital very highly.  I can't go into detail about all the wonderful things they have done for me and the many many animals I bring to them or we would be here all day.  But they are wonderful.

name: Sarai Arnberg
text: They all love your animals as their own. The prices are reasonable, and they won't do extra procedures without your consent, and won't you pressure you to do anything you can't afford or aren't comfortable with. Everything gets clearly explained without sounding condescending.

name: Susan Forbes
text: They always take great care of us at Moores Mill Animal Hospital. Very friendly and accommodating. The staff feel like friends as much as they feel like anything! I highly recommend them for your pet needs! ❤

name: henry gibbs
text: Friendly staff and great service.

name: Mary Simon
text: These vets are concerned about my pups and treat them as kindly as I do.  I am so happy I found them!

name: Brandy Pearl
text: We love Dr Puckett! He is so kind and patient with our furbaby Stewy. I always feel at ease and listened to by him and all the staff is super friendly. Above and beyond care is given always. Highly recommend!   -Brandy Pearl

name: aubie2014
text: Recommend 100%. I was personally called by the vet after my cat’s surgery to let me know she was recovering well. I never worry that my animals will be mistreated there. They have a friendly staff and a clean office.

name: Melissa Martin
text: Dr Puckett IS fantastic! I have a mixed breed rescue and he was able to identify all the breed characteristics from her various backgrounds. He is a wealth of knowledge and gave me awareness of possible future health issues based on her breeds. Very reasonably priced compared. I asked about several vaccines he educated me and steered you away from the unnecessary. A+++! Facility very clean & everyone is very friendly.

name: Cynthia Kahler
text: Moores Mill took care of my schnauzers, Molli and Luci, for four years. There is no way to describe what these vets meant to me. I sadly recently lost both, but the doctors made it so much easier for me to know when it was time. During the four years, they had excellent, thorough and compassionate care. Dr. Ware cried with me more than once. I love all these vets and all their staff. I would never go anywhere else.

name: Brooke Patton
text: We absolutely LOVE Moore's Mill Animal Hospital!  The staff is very knowledgeable and super friendly.  They always know who we are when we walk in the door and they go above and beyond to take care of our dog. Highly recommend!

name: Deborah Henderson
text: I am especially grateful that Dr. Puckett, our usual vet, will consult by phone when our Lacey has issues related to a chronic problem. He could make more money by requiring that I bring her in every time she has a flare-up and I have questions, but that is not how they work. I highly recommend Moores Mill Animal Hospital!

name: Megan Lacy
text: I love MMAH so much, I recommend this place to all my friends and family! The doctors and staff at MMAH take your animal's care to the next level while maintaining a friendly and warm environment for both you and your fur-baby. Client for life.

name: Summer Whatley
text:
I love Moores Mill Animal Hospital. The staff is very friendly and helpful. They helped diagnose and treat my dog and saved his life.
Thank you!

name: Allison Fritz
text: I actually made an appointment at a different vet for my new dog, and accidentally put the wrong vet into my maps and showed up at Moore's Mill.  They made room for me in their schedule, and even made the exam free, given that I had adopted my dog from a shelter (I guess it's their policy to cover the first exam if you've adopted your dog-- and this applied to me even though I didn't adopt here in Auburn).  They were very nice, and even gave me  a tour of the facility.  Furthermore, they made recommendations as to where to board my dog elsewhere, even though they have boarding services there.  This is not because their services are bad, but because my dog is quite active and they suggested that a place where she could play with other dogs might help her separation anxiety.

name: Marian Carcache
text: The doctors and staff at MMAH are wonderful.  They have always gone "the extra mile" for my dogs and for me. I could not love them more, and will never move away from Auburn as long as they are here to care for my precious dogs.

name: Ally Taylor
text: Dr.Puckett has been my go to vet for 7 years! He is always so helpful and friendly along with all of the front desk staff! I have a 9 year old black lab and two twin cats that are always given the best care! I would recommend this vet to anyone!

name: Carly Engel
text: Their vets and staff members are super sweet and phenomenal with taking care of animals.

name: Jennifer Salter
text:
Not only are all of the doctors and staff super friendly, but the clinic itself is one of the cleanest and best smelling vet clinics I have ever been in!
When I take my dachshund in, she sees Dr. Puckett, and she absolutely loves him! Dr. Puckett is the only vet she has ever wagged her tail for! And, while my dog doesn't necessarily care for the vet techs (who would like the people giving you shots?!), I personally love them; they are always so kind and gentle to my little dog.
I cannot begin to recommend Moores Mill Animal Hospital enough. I have lived in other areas of the country and have been through more than a few vets in that time, and I must say that Moores Mill is the best clinic I have ever used.

name: Laura Zimmerman
text: We came to Mill Animal Hospital for the first time because our 14 year old Australian Shepherd, Riley, was sick. The Doctor and entire staff were so friendly and understanding towards us and so loving and gentle with Riley. Unfortunately, Riley had something that was not able to be cured and very expensive to treat. The doctor explained our options and helped us to take the best and most kind course of action with Riley. This plan gave us a few more months with our dear Riley and when it was clear he was suffering, the doctor literally sat on the floor with us as we comforted Riley in his last moments. He really helped Riley when he was sick and also gave him a dignified and painless last moments with us. This place made a really hard time so much easier. When we are ready for a new "family member" again, we will definitely bring them to Moores Mill animal hospital. They are wonderful.

name: Karen Payton
text: Me and my dog Batman love love love this place. I feel very comfortable leaving him overnight or for a couple of days. Dr. Puckett is the best of the best.

name: Suzanne Woodall
text: Dr. Puckett and Dr. Ware are by far the best veterinary team I have had a dealing with. They compliment each other perfectly. I have had major and minor veterinary services performed by them and can not find a fault in any aspect of any of them. I will never use another vet. They are so patient and take as much time with each person and animal as is necessary. If you go there and have to wait- just remember that. I cannot say enough nice things about them. If you are looking for a trustworthy vet team - search no further.

name: Melanie Foshee
text: Great group of people that love on our fur babies

name: Dana Raughton
text: Great vet clinic! Fantastic, loving atmosphere & knowledgeable, caring staff.

name: Sharon Ketchen
text:
We've been taking our labs to MMAH since it opened. When I first met Dr. Puckett, I admit that I was immediately struck by his t-shirt and bright green pants (they made an impression, but I appreciated his sense of "style"). When he sat down WITH the dogs to give their exams I was really impressed. Many vets are "detached" but Dr. Puckett demonstrated that he genuinely loves dogs. By the end of the exam, it was like I had been talking to someone I had known for years. I immediately knew we found our new vet.

Dr. Ware came on later and I've been equally pleased with her too. She even took the time to show me her technique in trimming thick dark toenails.

I have yet to meet Dr. Poole, but from what I see and hear, he seems like he fits right in.

As for the clinic's techs and support staff,  they have gone above and beyond....not only in taking care of our pets...but in accommodating our needs too.

MMAH provides top notch, skilled clinic care with a warm, friendly  atmosphere.

name: Shelley Taylor
text: The staff is very friendly, efficient and caring. Dr. Puckett and Dr. Ware have both seen my furbabies and were fabulous. Both are sincere, caring, and great listeners when you have questions about your pet.

name: Chloe Popwell
text: They are SO nice! They genuinely care about the dogs and they are so professional! Would recommend!

name: JandA Jacobs
text: Friendly staff and caring doctors make a great combination in making me feel comfortable about caring for the needs of our pets. Highly recommend!

name: susan mitchell
text: Always so professional and nice. My sweet puppy loves the vet.  Always available to answer questions and put  our family at ease

name: Cathy Hawkins
text: Due to a family emergency I had to leave my baby there for a month. I think the fact that now, he can't wait to get in the door at the office pretty much says it all.

name: Robyn Kirkley
text: They are so friendly and treat you like family

name: Clement Tanaka
text: Wonderful veterinarians and staff!  Dr. Puckett and Dr. Ware are exceptional professionals who provide first class care in a friendly and immaculate facility.  Highly recommended!!

name: Marsha Edwards
text: When my dog, Bug, had to leave us, everyone at Moores Mill could not have been more understanding and compassionate. Lily (my cocker) and I highly recommend this clinic for any vet need!

name: Kelly Greene
text: Very dedicated staff! Always available to provide the best needs for our pets!

name: Justin Shiver
text: We love our friends at MMAH, because they love our best friends! We know we can trust them to provide the best care for our furbabies.

name: Lynn Weaver
text: Always polite and professional. Love that they help the Lee County Humane Society. Would highly recommend!

name: dAwn duffie
text: MMAH has fantastic, friendly & conscientious staff. We look to them for all of our dog’s needs: bathing, boarding, check-ups, as needed visits. We are glad to know them and have them for our dog!

name: Amanda Kennedy
text:
I left a review here a few years ago...noticed it's not up anymore. So I am leaving it again! Long story short, this time...
Took my kitten in to get her shots, I suppose they either gave it to her wrong or she ended up allergic to it. I'm thinking they gave it to her wrong because she has gotten shots every year since then and is totally fine. When they gave her the shots she jumped and shrilled to the top of her lungs! (I have a very easy going cat and she never complained like before at any other vet clinic she went to) Also the most expensive vet clinc I've been to besides an emergency vet. I believe I spent $120 or possibly $150 on just a check up and her shots...ridiculous.
She did not eat that night or the next day and was puking. She started to not be able to walk straight! So we took her up there again to see what was wrong. They gave her another shot suppose to help her (making me nervous) she didn't shrill this time (because the first time they hurt her, giving it to her wrong). And made me pay even more money even though it was their fault she had to come back!

text: I've been using Moore's Mill Animal Hospital since they opened and even before then,  Dr. Puckett was one of my pets' vet at his previous location. Five years ago, my then 4-month-old, Lab-mix puppy was bitten by a Copperhead snake. Dr. Puckett told me he could treat my puppy there instead of having to take him to Auburn University. I left my puppy, terrified he wouldn't make it, but I knew Dr. Puckett would do everything he could. Two days later, I picked up my sweet boy and brought him home. Other than some slight scarring, he's done well. Not only did he save my Rex, but the cost of treatment was significantly less than it would have been at AU. All of the people who work at Moore's Mill Animal Hospital are awesome! I wouldn't take my pets anywhere else!!

text: I trust my pets at Duke Animal clinic.  I take my dog to get his teeth cleaned and Dr. Duke does a great job at that, and for everything else, the clinic is very accommodating for my schedule.  I even take my dog there for a bath and nail trim because they do a good job.

name: Sheli E
text:
My super-senior, Max, went in for a full mouth extraction due to stomatitis. Dr Duke was referring to me by two clinics and I’m extremely happy with the care my baby received.

A vet tech from the clinic I went to for a second opinion had told me the usual price was around 900, but to be aware it may cost more depending on any additional meds or services he may need. The office at Duke Animal Clinic quoted the same price. 900 was more than reasonable as I usually get vet care in Atlanta and prices are insane there.

Although his appointment was further out than I had hoped, when he finally had his surgery I was  pleased at the level of care he received and that Dr Duke gave me a copy of mouth photos (before and after) and explained what he did by showing me on the photos.

Max is healing up nicely, is back to being mischievous, AND the price was just under 900 even though I was prepared for more.

I 100% recommend Duke Animal Clinic to anyone needing dental care for their pets.

name: Ligma
text: Always bring my cats here. Duke animals clinic is the best IMO

name: Adam Campbell
text: My wife took her Chihuahua to Duke Animal Clinic to have a procedure done for his teeth. We were told by the clinic that the cost was going to be around $400, which we were fine with. After the procedure, the clinic charged us nearly $700 without any change in scope-of-service or explanation of the increase. This is beyond unethical business practice. The people that run Duke Animal Clinic are the dishonest crooks they have proven themselves to be. If they cannot be trusted at their word, how can someone trust them with their pets?

name: Cynthia Jones
text: The Doctors and Staff are top notch and honest with tx for your furbabies. They will never try to talk you into things that you may not be able to afford and will never make you feel guilty about it. They are so kind and compassionate. Loving environment.

name: Krizia Tokarski Jackson
text: Dr. Duke is amazing with my dogs, and very friendly. All the staff was helpful and kind. He took the time to answer all of our questions patiently and makes us feel like he really cares about animals. Not to mention prices are extremely reasonable, plus they do military discount.

text: They are so awesome and caring.Dr. duke himself is one of the very best vets i have ever seen.he saved my baby belle and i will forever be thankful to him.

name: Olivia McCarter
text: I've used Dr. Mims ever since I moved to Alabama and got my first dog. He is a very compassionate and kind man and he was very good with Ella. When she had a tumor, he quickly diagnosed it and sent off a sample of it to confirm. We had to go through chemotherapy and it was coming to the point where my Lab was excited to go to vet. That's how great these people are. They knew Ella by name and were very gentle and kind to her. I'll continue to use Dr. Mims and Dr. Duke and recommend them to anyone with pets.

name: Tracy Johnson
text: I only like Dr. Duke. Everyone else puts fear in me like they suggest things that I dont agree my pets need. Ive had dogs all my life and they have always lived long healthy lives. Dr. Duke always said they are healthy when I would see him. He never suggested anything like the others all do.

name: Linda Hulsey
text: Everyone at Duke's have been great.  The prices are very reasonable and usually you are able to see a vet in a very short time.  This is first vets office that I have been totally comfortable with my babies being here.  I walked in to check the place unannounced and was given a tour.  Found the staff friendly and the place was very clean.  Since moving back to Mobile this is the first place that I am truly comfortable bring my 12 Dachshunds to.  Recommend Duke Animal Clinic to anyone with pets.

name: Leigh Merz
text: They always take great care of our fur babies!

name: Mike Rankin
text:
I have been using Duke since 2011.  I have always been pleased with the veterinarians at Duke, and until a year ago was please with the office staff.  But a year ago, I noticed a lot of turnover in the office.  Now, Duke's office is an administrative nightmare.

Until Duke is able to retain a front office staff long enough to attain seasoned, well functioning staff employees, I would avoid this clinic.

name: Joshua Carter
text: My 13yo English Springer Spaniel was very sick.   After spending a night in the Vet ER, I just showed up on a Saturday with no scheduled appointment very worried and had never seen him before.  Dr. Duke was nice enough to stay late and look at him.  Ollie is alive today thanks to him.  Great guy.  great place.  very affordable.  I highly recommend them!

name: Sherry McSween
text: I have used Duke animal clinic for 30 years with large and small animals. Dr. Duke has always gone above and beyond in taking care of our animals along with Dr. Justin Mims.. The Doctors have gone to extra lengths to treat my animals in the best way possible. Staff is good and always try to help in anyway they can. They also take after hours calls for established clients. Dr. Duke specializes in dentistry and has clients come from all over the Gulf Coast. I can't tell you how happy I am with this clinic.

name: T&D Professional Tree Removal
text: I went the first time and everyone made us feel welcome. They tended to my pet's needs and the price was very affordable. We Thank ALL of them there for their hospitality.

text: Duke Animal Clinic was recommended by a good friend. We were seen right away and made to feel welcome.Care and  cleanliness was excellant.  I will switch to this Vet for our other furry children(3 dogs and 2 Cats).

text: Overall we love the care we receive at Duke Animal Clinic. Appointments are always available and the staff is very caring. We brought our rescue dog here after adopting her. They’ve always provided great care

name: Ruth Darlene Stewart
text: This is update to my review a few months ago.  October 23 2018.  Last evening I had an emergency with one of my older beagles.  Dr. Jane Snead was on call. I give her five stars!  She was compassionate, competent and very thorough in her treatment of my Kate. Unfortunately due to bleeding abdominal tumor the decision was made to PTS.  I have the most respect for veterinarians that take on call for their established clients.  Many vets are opting to send their clients to ER clinic and not take call at all. Thank you Dr. Snead for being available and the excellent care provided to Kate.   I have used Dr. Duke ( Duke Animal Clinic) for almost 40 years.  Dr. Mims and Dr. Duke as well as others have always been there when needed. His support staff are always outstanding and friendly.  I have received excellent care and encourage others to use Duke Animal Clinic

name: Murriah Barnette
text: I love Duke Animal Clinic! I volunteered/worked there a few years in middle and high school. Dr. Duke and his staff really care and treat your pets as if they were their own. I am glad to be back in Mobile!

text: We've been to three different vets with our 2 yr old dog and this is easily the best. They are always looking out for what's best for our dog and never overcharge! Definitely recommend these guys!

text: Dr. Duke and Dr. Newcombe are the best vets I have ever known. I have used 4 other vets in my 69 years and they don't even compare to the Duke clinic. They are reasonable also.

text: I have been using Duke Animal Clinic for the past two years. I would not trust anyone else with my pets! Dr. Duke, Dr. Mims, Dr. Caddell and the rest of the staff are amazing :)

text: Duke animal clinic came out to my house to examine my horses, Dr.Mims was excellent with horses. I would recommend him to any one. The prices were also great!

text: Unprofessional staff! We had a bad experience and cannot even share our review without the clinic falsly reporting it!  The staff reports any negative review, although legitimate, then uses friends and employees spouses/family to flood positive reviews. Just ask around town,  Duke animal clinics reputation speaks for itself and Dr Mims takes most of the accolades. If a business gets so worked up and has the time to troll Google daily, they may not be the best business to trust with your pets care.

name: Nathan Hewlett
text: Refused to listen to my opinion and consider my ideas once their ideas had proven to not be working.

name: J Slay
text: We've always taken our dogs to duke animal clinic and never had problems, however that all came crashing down yesterday on 7/15/16 our 2 year old dachshund maverick was shot in the neck through our privacy fence by a pellet gun. At the time we didn't know it was a gun shot, we figured it he caught a nail in the neck while playing with his brother under our shed. When my wife showed up at 1:20 the receptionist was as rude as anyone could be to my already frantic wife. She told her no vets were in because they were on lunch. Then when my wife said so there's not a single thing you can do (keep in mind my dog is right in front of her bleeding all over the place) she rolled her eyes and said she could kennel him until they got back from lunch unless it was a real emergency...really lady??my dog is bleeding from his neck everywhere, but no it's not an emergency. After my took him down the road to Irby Overton where they immediately took him back and extracted the bullet from his neck. They said if it would've been a centimeter lower it would've hit his artery in his neck and he would've bled to death in a matter of minutes. Needless to say we are switching to Irby Overton permanently.

name: C Lynn
text: When you pay $60 for a meaningless consult, you should be allowed to share your experience. However, this business seems to have a lot of time on their hands to continuously attempt to dispute a legitimate review. Dr. Duke was condescending and his experience seems to be as out of date as the clinic itself is. I will not use this clinic ever, and would not trust anyone in this clinic with my pets.

name: Charla Ruby
text: Dr duke is an insensitive crule jurk. He did not sedate my baby enough,then used too big of a needle and kept shoving it in and out so much that she was in pain scared crying out till she finally left this word. Never ever is this the way it is supposed to be. 😩😓😡

name: Jerry Adams
text: This place is awesome the vet Dr. Took extra time to fix my cats problem where the other place I took her took didn’t  if your reading this and need a awesome  place to bring your pet this is the place

text: Awesome vets and prices!  The building is a little dated but otherwise obviously state of the art when it was new.  Despite being an old building, there was no lingering pet smell anywhere.

name: Angela Gosnell
text: Wonderful express. Staff is so nice. We love our vet.

text: We love Dr. STRUBY!  WE were there picking medications

name: ELLE C
text: The ENTIRE staff (from the receptionists to the Vet assistants) and Dr. Struby ESPECIALLY are AMAZING!!!  I've been to a lot of vets for my animals throughout my life and where some have been good, Dr. Struby is the ABSOLUTE BEST!!! She treats your pet like it's hers and like the sweet baby they are.  She doesn't just throw them up on the cold table and begin the examination, she gets down on the floor with them (literally) and gets them feeling more comfortable!  And that means a lot, because my golden retriever puppy is kind of a scaredy cat.  Lol, but seriously!  She really takes time to do a comprehensive check and explains everything and answers ALL of your questions.  She's not just trying to rush you in and out and take your money.   I've never been more impressed with a Vet in my life!!  I canNOT say enough about this place and Dr. Struby!!!  If you're in need of a vet, Robinson Hill Road Vet Clinic is THE place if you want the BEST and a Vet (and the rest of the staff, too) that TRULY and SINCERELY cares about your furry baby!!!!  ABSOLUTELY ADORE this place!!!!  🥰👍🙌👏

He basically tortured my cat for close to 20 hours because has the veterinary knowledge of a lamp post. My cat is going to have life long medical issues because of him. And he will be lucky if he recovers at all. Do not take your pets here unless you just need some flea pills, or you are ready to put them down. Hes probably pretty good at that.
