text: So I have taken My dog here a few times. The first few visits were pretty routine. They are nice ,clean and respectful.My dog had some swollen lymphoids and he  needed blood tests and such. I couldn’t afford them right off. They went ahead and did the test and let me pay it in payments.That was really going beyond the norm when it comes to a vet. So the test came back As cancer. I am so devastated. I was so upset in the office that I had to walk out side and get my self together. When I was out there I locked my keys in the car! Grrrrr... My phone wallet and insurance information were all inside of the car as well! Dr. Fuqua called a lock smith and paid for thier services! I couldn’t believe it! He is a good doctor and an even better man! Thank u Dr. Fuqua!You are awesome!

name: Ben Baugh
text: I have been using All Creatures for the last 10 years. I have 3 Dachshunds and Dr. Hankes and his staff treat them with great care.  I live 30 minutes away and its worth the drive to get great care for my 4 legged kids.  The staff treats our dogs like family. The services they provide are priced fair and reasonable.  In fact, Dr.Hankes  has made himself available on weekends to make sure our pets are taken care off when we have emergency's from time to time.There have been instances that we have needed his expertise on a weekend and Dr. Hankes has helped us out then as well. If you need a Vet that knows what hes doing, I suggest going to All Creatures and tell them Ben sent you.

name: Kelly Daniel
text: We love visiting Dr. Hankes and his staff at All Creatures Pet Hospital! They always love on our two fur babies when we visit their office. Dr. Hankes was especially patient with our many questions when we added our most recent rescue puppy to the family. We wouldn't recommend anyone else to take care of our babies!

name: Charles McKinney
text: Fantastic staff who will remember your name and your pets. Very personable.

name: Erica LaRoman
text: Love the workers and how they treated my baby Minnie! I recommend them to any one they are nice to talk to.

name: Erica LaRoman
text: Love the workers and how they treated my baby Minnie! I recommend them to any one they are nice to talk to.

name: Jennifer Levesque
text:
We have taken our fur babies to Dr Hankes for several years now. He kept my yorkie Rudy, who had congestive heart failure, alive and happy for many more years than I thought was possible. Once Rudy did pass away Dr Hankes was very kind and understanding of our pain he even sent me flowers. My other fur baby Fi-Fi a Chihuahua mix that had been abandoned in a box on the vets door step. Knowing I was looking for a puppy he gave us a call.
When we got our next puppy Pete a few months ago from Tuscaloosa Metro Animal shelter we had dr Ted check him out and even though we had a free neuter do to us at the shelter we prefered to have Dr Hankes perform the operation because Ted uses more safety procedures and gives the animal pain meds to take at home where many vets skip things like IVs and pain control. Ted puts the animals safty and pain control as a high priority.
Dr Hankes has so much experience with animals from trauma (U.S. Army vet) to being a cat lover himself. He truly is an awsome vet.

name: Candy Rue
text: I felt very comfortable with the staff here,  I felt 100 perfect sure in placing my bull dog in all creatures hands.

name: Marie Haulsey
text: The folks at All Creatures took wonderful care of our four animals during the three years we lived in Gardendale.  Everyone was friendly, and took the time to get to know not just our animals' physical concerns, but also their personalities.  Our dogs miss their human and animal friends at day care.  In one case of emergency, Dr. Hankes and Denise stayed over an hour extra to take care of one of our animals, and in another, Dr. Hankes made a special trip back to the clinic for us.

name: Ken Levesque
text:
2-15-17:  my two dogs went to All Creatures two days ago with explosive diarreah and vomiting.  It was a horrendous weekend.  We tried Pepto Bismal and other things.  Monday morning I took my little dogs down there and was greeted warmly by the staff.  They showed genuine concern asked lots of questions.  The feeling I had was like they were family.  Then the doctor just didn't alleviate the sickness but it was almost "creepy" how he COMMANDED the situation.  My pets came home the same day and the vomiting and diarreah FULLY ERADICATED.  Animal medicine is converted into TALENTED HEALING at All Creatures Pet Hospital.  I can't another option around here.

I've taken my 2 dogs to Dr. Ted many times in the last year or so and have had nothing but a great experience.  I think he's a terrific and caring doctor and extremely knowledgeable.  All of his staff are friendly and always on the move.  They don't like it when people have to wait and they seem to work really hard to get to everyone.  I also have had my 2 pets in the kennel there and I was invited to go back and see them anytime I wanted.  I did go back to the kennels and the "condos" and they are extremely clean and beautiful.  Dr. Ted is an Afghanistan Army Veteran so I'm really glad that my vet is a real vet!  He saved my little dog from a heart problem that otherwise would have killed him.  I went to Dr. Ted when the treatments he was getting in another Vet Clinic in Gardendale weren't having any affect.  I've been please ever since.  I won't go anywhere else.  I've never thought I over paid either.

name: Billy Hughes
text: Kind and caring staff and doctor!!

name: Janet Sanders
text: On Oct 31st 2014 my 4 pound toy poodle Gabbi was dropped by my elderly father. She fell four feet on her head to a concrete floor. She was unconscious and not breathing. I rushed her to her Veterinarian Dr. Ted Hankes at All Creatures. Dr. Hankes and his staff did everything right to save her life. At the time we did not know that she had two scull fractures and a fractured vertebra. Thankfully Dr. Hankes prepared for the worst. The care he gave her kept her brain from swelling and kept her alive. After getting Gabbi stable he sent me to an emergency hospital where he continued to call and check on her the entire weekend. I am very happy to say that because of his excellent care along with many other excellent doctors my precious girl is completely well. Other than the fact she is extremely spoiled and overweight. If you could see Gabbi today you would never know the head trauma she suffered. She had a checkup today and is doing very well. I can't put into words the gratitude I feel for the entire staff at All Creatures. Thank you to everyone that had a hand in saving my baby girl. Also thanks for the care you give her older sister CoCo.  My husband and I will be eternally grateful.

name: Jan Berry
text:
Dr. Hankes, Denise, and the gang at All Creatures are tops when it comes to taking care of my baby girl, Sasha!  BYW, please don't tell Sasha she's a c-a-t.  Sasha was adopted from All Creatures 12 yrs ago as a 6 wk old when Dr. Allen held the reins and my son was a lab tech.

With the arrival of Dr. Hankes (and my son was gone to college), as you can imagine there were questions about the changes coming.  I have been so very pleased with the continuation of great services and getting to know another vet who is not only a well trained physician but truly loves all the pets that come in and wants the very best for them and their guardians.  The big bonus is that Denise (Sr. Lab Tech), who Sasha usually sees - and Sasha's very shy, has won over my baby and even has her choosing to stay with Ms. Denise instead of me after injections and exams some days.  That says A LOT for the caring ways of the team at All Creatures and who they are as crew members/care givers not just employees..

Recently, Sasha had a period of rapid weight loss after getting a kidney issue under control and Dr. Hankes found that she had a growth on her thyroid as well as fluid around her heart causing breathing issues.  She was a very sick little girl.  Dr. Hankes treated her heart and brought it under control and within a period of weeks.  Dr. Hankes, teamed with Dr. Hall, was then able to remove the problematic portion of the thyroid and the growth.  Now 4 wks after surgery, her heart is doing well - she's gaining weight and running round the house like a wild 4 yr old instead of a 12 yr old.  Dr. Hankes and Dr. Hall did a great job with the surgery, the staff let Sasha recouperate in her basket with a blanket from home and are now keeping a tabs on her for a while to make sure her remaining thyroid is functioning properly.  Thanks to their great care, we're looking forward to many more years together.

I have recommended All Creatures to my family, friends and new neighbors who are in need of a vet and have for years and hope you'll see them, too.  I don't know of any Pet Hospital around where you can get the top quality care PLUS the Super Care Givers that are on the team with Dr. Hankes at All Creatures Pet Hospital.  You'll be glad you've found one of the gems of not only Gardendale but the Greater Birmingham/Jefferson Area.

name: Kaitlyn Koehler
text: Everything and everyone was amazing!

name: Sueann Repp
text: We have been very pleased with the care that has been given to our pets.  Thank you!

name: ralph thomas
text: GREAT VETS, GREAT AND CARING EMPLYEES

name: denise Nance
text: The staff are very friendly .

name: Amy Davis
text: Noticed my now-indoor cat has tape worms, called Weatherly and he was tested, treated, vaccinated and microchipped in less than 30 minutes. For a first time visit, I was highly impressed! The doctor and technicians were great and friendly. My new veterinarian!! I will say that the price I was quoted for everything ended up being a good bit cheaper than the actual cost, so I'll have to verify everything before having the procedures done in the future.

name: Alicia Kenerley
text: The vet really set my mind at ease twice in one month with 2 different pets. It is quite pricey but Dr Brunner was very sweet to my kitties and thoroughly explained their treatment.

name: Emma Bolden
text: I can't even begin to express my gratitude to the doctors and staff at Weatherly Animal Hospital. Dr. Brunner took such excellent care of my senior cat and of me. He helped me to make the right decisions for her. When it came time to let her go, Dr. Brunner, Nicole, Jill, and the staff were supportive, gentle, and kind. I cannot recommend Weatherly Animal Hospital enough.

name: Alan Thompson
text: The only reason for the 4 star instead of 5 star is that we thought they were very expensive.  We had contact with two of the three vets who cover the clinic and both were very nice and caring.

name: Cheryl Vance
text: We have always been extremely pleased with the care our fur babies have received here. Dr. Brunner and the entire staff at Weatherly are knowledgeable, friendly, and compassionate. I highly recommend them.

name: Jacques Thompson
text: Our puppy has been well provided for over the last 7 years is life. Without Jill in the crew he would be lost. They took care of every concern and the concerns became their own. They are part of the puppy family!

name: Lori Smith
text: We recently moved to Pelham from Ohio, and chose this clinic based on proximity to our home more than anything. What a lucky choice that was! We had a minor emergency with one of our dogs, then a much more serious situation with the other within a month of moving here. The entire staff was helpful, compassionate, and kind, and I feel like our pets are receiving top notch care. Highly recommended.

name: Beth C
text: The staff was kind and professional, the doctor was as well - and he understood my limited income issue. The facility is very clean and smells like stepping into someone's home, not some smelly pet place or overly sanitized hospital.

name: Holly Kinney
text:
I do not typically write reviews, but I was genuinely distressed about the negative review written Ms. Jacoby. I am sorry about her ill pet; I know this is always stressful. However, I have to believe that this was merely a misunderstanding by someone with limited experience at this clinic. We have taken all of our pets to Weatherly Animal Hospital in Alabaster for more than 15 years and have always received exceptional care. They were amazingly compassionate when our elderly dog had to be put to sleep, and were literally there holding our hand through the whole thing. Additionally, we board our dogs there when we go on vacation---which believe me---requires a great deal of trust!

I assume that Ms. Jacoby was referring to Michelle when she talked about the 'receptionist'. Michelle is the office manager, and even more than being a professional, she has always proven to be a compassionate individual with a house full of her own pets. Again, I have to assume that there was a miscommunication problem.

I hope that others with medical emergencies or those looking for a safe, compassionate practice to take care of their pets will give Weatherly a chance. They say that they think of themselves as the 'other' family doctor, and I believe them.

name: Matthew Burford
text: Nice location in Alabaster.  Nice knowledgeable staff.

name: Dianne Scott
text: Great docs and staff.

name: Bethany Johnson
text: So amazing

name: laura jacoby
text: When we visited this clinic, our dog was x-rayed by Dr. Leedy and we were told he more-than-likely had terminal cancer.  She told us Dr. Brunner would review the x-rays and give us a call with a second opinion.  I didn't receive a call, but when I followed up the next week, Dr. Brunner acted as though he had never reviewed the x-rays and basically read me Dr. Leedy's notes.  We had to take our dog back when he became unable to walk and Dr. Leedy was very nice, but when I mentioned our unhappiness with Dr. Brunner and how we felt he did not take the time to adequately review the x-rays, the receptionist became defensive and basically called me a liar.  As someone with a dying family pet with no hope of getting better, we were less than happy with the clinc's obscene lack of compassion.  Dr. Leedy was nice enough, but we have opted to switch to a farther away, more expensive clinic because they just seem to care more.

name: Lori Covington-Strouss
text:
I use both the Weatherly and Southlake clinics depending on where my day takes me. I have had nothing but wonderful experiences at both locations. The staff always know my pets by name and always have time to explain everything to me concerning my pets care. I'm a pet Mom of two cats, one of whom is diabetic and has been for 4 years now - thanks to great care he is doing wonderful. I also have two dogs and one of them suffers from allergies - he gets lots of love and care at the clinic plus they call on a regular basis just to check and see that he is doing ok.

Last year,  we had to put our 15 year old dog down, the compassion and care we received at the Southlake clinic made our experience so much easier.
Our pets will be patients of the Weatherly & Southlake clinics for life.

From Syrius, Evie, Kovu, Mika, Lori & Bart - Thank You !!!!

name: Justkeep Swimming
text: Very friendly professional staff

name: Jill Wegener
text: Friendly staff.

name: Italia Quiroga
text: I love this clinic

name: Debra Gordon-Hellman
text: LOVE Dr. Brothers and her wonderful staff.   After bad experiences elsewhere, I found Dr. Brothers, and my pets and I have been happy ever since.  I've sent others to her, and they like NBAH too.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving the review! We hope that we will always meet and exceed expectations.

name: Terri Tipton
text: It's not #10, "Very Likely" that I will recommend North Blount Animal Hospital, it is, "I Will Recommend." I travel 2 hours to bring my pets back to Dr. Angel Brothers. I love my pets and I need to know that the vet I go to loves them as well and will provide quality care for them. Dr. Angel, as I call her, not only knows her "stuff” and knows it well, she provides compassionate care of the highest quality and will share information I need to know openly and honestly. She has helped me through many situations with my pets and I am so grateful. You will be hard-pressed to find another vet like her.

resp.text: Thank you, Terri! I am so honored that you travel the distance that you do to let me care for your pets. It is always a pleasure!

name: J Young
text: Dr. Brothers and her entire staff are the absolute BEST! They are knowledgeable, efficient, responsive and caring. And, did I mention welcoming, compassionate and helpful?  They have cared for our menagerie for years and we have never had one negative experience. I would recommend Dr. Brothers and North Blount Animal Hospital to anyone for the care of their four-legged family members. They will treat them as if they were their own!

resp.text: Oh, thank you! We are all thrilled to know that we are doing well and very much appreciate your affirmation!

text: I am not sure why my name is appearing as Lynn King he is my brother but this review is about my Freddy Joe  Willy and I am extremely impressed with Dr Brothers and her staff.  Here is the review I submitted.I was very impressed with everything about your service.  My babies are my family and all of them are special.  They are all rescue babies and I have promised to care for them the best I can.  I appreciate the caring feeling I experienced and I will be bringing my other 2 as their checkups require. In

name: Morgan Kilgo
text: I have been taking my pup here since she was 6 weeks old. She is now 2 years old and this morning Dr. Brothers removed a tumor from her foot. Dr. Brothers personally called me after the surgery to let me know that it was a success..  The price for the services rendered was much lower than I was even expecting so I was happy to pay! She is a very caring and compassionate vet and the only one I trust with my fur baby! I would most definitely reccomend this facility to anyone seeking quality vet services for their animals!

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to post your kind words!

name: jason everett
text: Doctor Brothers and her staff are the only vets that I truly trust in North Alabama. The have been caring and compassionate on the many occasions that I’ve had our pets in. We have had everything from first shots and spays/ neuters to cancer checks( tumor removed/ benign (thank God) to end of life care. They have celebrated with us, guided us, and cried with us. My new adopted shepherd will be in for a visit as soon as we can. Not for treatment (the animal shelter that we got her from has to handle a few things first) but just to meet them.( When it is time for more shots, she’ll be at Dr Brothers.) Just because they will be as happy for us as we are. They are truly caring individuals that I would recommend to anyone looking for a great vet.

resp.text: Thank you!! We can't wait to meet your new one!

name: John D.
text: Take all my animals here. Dr. Brothers and the entire staff is wonderful!!

name: Renee Higginbotham
text: Couldn't ask for better service. They truly care and love my babies like family. Can't imagine what I would do without them. Much love and appreciation for the ENTIRE staff.

resp.text: We appreciate you and your sweet pets as well! Thank you so much for the kind words.

name: Becky Garren
text: I have been taking my beloved pets to Dr. Brothers since she first opened her clinic.  She is one of the most compassionate vets I have ever met.  She has shared laughs in the good times and has shared tears in the sad times.  Dr. Brothers and her staff are wonderful.  I can always count on excellent care when my furbabies need medical attention.  Thanks for all you do!

resp.text: Thank you so much ❤️!

name: Pamela Williams
text:
Dr Brothers and her staff are caring, kind people who are as concerned for their clients as they are their animal patients. The office runs smoothly and I never am rushed through appointments. I know that Dr Brothers will discuss options for my dog or cat’s care. She leaves the choice for me to make and never makes me feel wrong in that choice. I know personally she cares for both people and pets as she has helped me with many hard decisions during the last year with the loss of beloved 3 elder dogs. One of those dogs had a stroke three days before my husband died of brain cancer. She dealt with my hysteria, my pain, and terror with gentleness, understanding, and compassion. She took care of my dog as if he were her own. She truly has a big heart.
Thank you Dr Brothers and your staff

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share such kind thoughts.♥️

name: Tracy P
text: This is seriously a great place. All four of our “rescue” pets have had a somewhat difficult past and require a little more than average care. On our first visit we got there a few minutes early with our two dogs and two cats and in no time at all they were seeing Doctor Brothers... so... no waiting!! All our fur babies loved her and the dogs were laying at her feet not long after being seen and the cats were at ease too. They got their shots and blood draws, she diagnosed and prescribed meds for a yeast infection in one of our cat's ears that was previously undetected for years and found a hernia and a tumor in our newest dog’s abdomen. A week or so later she repaired the hernia and removed the tumor, spayed her and pulled four broken/bad teeth and now she’s doing just fine. She is VERY happy and active now and actually runs and plays. We love Dr. Brothers, we really love her and her office staff too! Excellent care at reasonable prices!! Thank you!! - Sherri & Tracy

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We are grateful to have you and look forward to many years with you and your pets!

name: Lisa Mcgill
text:
Very professional veterinarian. Dr. Brothers first impressed me when she called me herself to let me know how the outcome of surgery went. The staff did not call. She personally took the time to let me know that my fur baby was ok. That meant a lot and still does. That was many many years ago. I have taken my cats,kittens, puppies, and dogs for everything from spaying,  neaurtering,  shots, flea and tick treatment.  There have been a couple of my babies that had to be euthanized,  but she did everything she could to prevent that. Her facility is always clean and the staff is always nice. Dr. Brothers is excellent at her job. I am grateful for her and I am so glad she is close by. I have an appointment for a momma cat to be fixed in January 2020 and I can bet you, when surgery is over, she will call. Thank you everyone
at North Blount Animal Hospital for the way you care.

resp.text: Thank you for your complimentary comments and great loyalty!

name: Mindy Chaviers
text: Dr. Brothers and the entire staff are amazing! Most friendly, thoughtful and informative folks I've encountered! I can't imagine the experience could be even better than it has been for our family and pets!

name: ben tims
text: We have a lot of pets . Dr Brothers has seen all of them . We are thankful for her services .

resp.text: Thank you! We are grateful for your family and pets.

name: Lori Criswell
text: We have used Dr. Brothers and her staff for several different animals and many different services.  Most of our animals are rescued animals.  One particular story is about Marty McFly.  I was working at a client's office and took a puppy that was in the street.  I ended up having to leave the client's office early because of the puppy.  On the way, I called to see if they could fit me in because I knew the puppy needed to be seen.  They made room for Marty, who was worm infested, flea infested, and malnourished.  Thanks to Dr. Brothers and her staff, Marty McFly is a thriving one-year old!  Dr. Brothers has also had to be there at the end of life of some of my animals, and she does it with the utmost care and concern; it seems as if they are her animals, too.  I really can't say enough about the great service we have received!

resp.text: Thank you SO much for such a sweet review! We are always happy to see you and your pets!

name: Abby Ingram
text: My “Sweet Dixie” had a stroke around 6:30am on a snowy Friday morning. I left a message on emergency line, halfway expecting no response due to the weather. Dr. Brothers called me back quickly and had me bring Dixie to the office. Dixie was seen immediately upon arrival. Dr. Brothers and her staff were very knowledgeable and compassionate about our situation. I was convinced we would be putting Dixie to sleep that day, but after going over options DrB recommended us try medication for a few days and reevaluate. Each day Dixie significantly improved. 6 days later she’s back to her spoiled rotten self. I’m thankful for DrB’s knowledge and advice because it has given my family more time with our “Sweet Dixie.”

resp.text: We are soooo glad Dixie responded as well as she did! Thank you for the kind praise. Having Dixie around longer makes us happy, too!

resp.text: The FTC and federal laws prohibit price setting. Therefore, we do not discuss cost of services with other animal hospitals. However, statements made from clients coming from other practices indicate that we are very competitive and sometimes lower, compared to other practices in our area. Perhaps your perception does not reflect a comparison of exactly equal services? At any rate, we are always happy to provide estimates for services before they are performed and routinely give them for any higher cost procedures.

text: My baby Molly had a bad swollen right eye . She was treated with dignity and professionalized service .... After her visit her eye is doing just great ..... Thank you North Blount !

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Light! We are glad to hear that Molly is improving quickly.

name: Sara Britnell
text: My dog unfortunately developed a bad bout of pancreatitis while we were visiting my parents on Christmas. Dr. Crisman and everyone at the clinic were fantastic! They worked us in on a busy Saturday, walked us through the prognosis, and helped us develop a plan to manage his symptoms for the drive back to North Carolina. Dr. Crisman was so empathetic and kind - he really helped us understand what we needed to do. I can’t begin to express how thankful we were to receive such good care when we were so far from home. I would recommend Dr. Crisman and the 280 Animal Medical Center to anyone!!

name: Nameless Faceless
text:
Dr. Sarah Juliana is amazing. She's very comforting as well as knowledgeable. The staff is very helpful and very accommodating. Always willing to help you out with an emergency appointment or even  random pet questions. Prices on food, medications, grooming, vaccinations, and examinations are VERY FAIR! Far better than any other veterinary office we have been to.
We always receive good quality care here. I won't take my fur babies anywhere else!
🐾❤️🐕🏥

name: Lisa Forrestor
text: Many reasons why, exceptional group!

name: Alex Lowry
text: Very rude front staff. Me and several customers were not helped properly.

name: Brenda Williamson
text:
We have never dealt with more caring folks than 280 Animal Medical Center. We had a poor experience with another vet when we first moved to Chelsea 3 years ago, and I happened onto this clinic while looking online. What a blessing that was!!
Our Zoe got really ill recently while we were on vacation, and with great hesitation, I called Dr. Crisman this past Sunday, because I thought Zoe's situation was critical. I would never bother a doctor on the weekend unless I felt it was a dire emergency, but I was so anxious. It wasn't long before we got a call back from an incredibly kind vet who listened intently, asked questions, and told us exactly what we needed to do to help Zoe. Dr Jay put me at perfect ease about calling him on a Sunday, making me feel so much better. He has since evaluated Zoe, and she is so much better as of today.
I write this mainly to tell you that we got a personal call from Dr. Crisman this morning to check on Zoe. We've had animals and vets for years and years, but we have never had a more caring doctor to care for our fur baby.
Dr Crisman's staff is phenomenal, his grooming staff and services are awesome, and boarding has been wonderful, too!  The facility is immaculate which speaks volumes to me. What else can I say? These folks are special and a rarity!!

name: Walter Riggs
text:
When my girl fractured her neck, it took us a while to properly diagnose her (hairline fracture). But it was all hands on deck till we figured it out.

The wall of Auburn degrees is really all I needed to know.

name: Rhonda Heffner
text: Amazing vet!

name: Terri Paramore
text: This is the best vet hospital! From the friendly staff at the reception to each vet and assistant...they are GREAT !  They have taken care of my pets from routine care to spay and dentals. Dr. Crisman did a great job performing my Yorkie spaying and when he called, he gave me a detailed report and did not rush me off the phone. He also met with us again when we picked her up with photos and a full report of everything! They’ve worked us in when needed and have met my family with their pet after hours for an emergency . I would never go anywhere else!   If you think the prices are a little high, remember... you get what you pay for and for my pets, I want A+ service and you get that here!

name: Kimmie Dee
text:
Highly recommend Dr. Jay Crisman, Dr. Whitten & Dr. Sarah & the entire Staff @ 280 AMC for their professionalism and the special care they give, with exceptional treatment of my pets. Everyone here is friendly, kind, and knowledgeable - always taking time to explain everything and answer questions - with patience...

They all seem to really enjoy the nature of their profession and enjoy helping my pets - always with smiles, patience & kindness... Always a great experience...  Love this place ❤️

name: Judy Aycock
text: Best vets around. Kindest and most compassionate staff. Couldn't say enough good words about 280 AMC.

text: I had to visit this vet when our little one was attacked by a bigger dog as our normal vet was out of the office that day, and I fell in love. I Loved all the people here. They care about your pet as a loved one. They even have well visits and snacks to make your pet more comfortable. This is our new family vet.

text: Without a doubt, the best vet experience I have had in this country!  LOVE this group! Whether it's been a serious accident (all survived, thanks  to their superb care!) or routine exams, couldn't ask for better care!!! Highly recommend Dr. Crisman and staff! Simply the best around here!!!

text: Rattle snake bite on my dogs face on a Saturday was no problem for the Vet and staff. They showed up after an hour's head notice and took care of my fur baby. My mother now takes her dog to this vet regularly and loves it.

text: I absolutely love this place! Whenever I walk into 280 AMC I feel like I'm right at home. If you want some of the greatest care for your pets go see Dr. Jay, Dr. Sarah and the staff at 280 AMC!

text: Absolutely horrible experience. The vet told me to give her some syrup to help her low blood sugar, and then all would be fine. When it started getting worse, the vet refused to do blood work on my dog, and said it was “female problems”, but when she started having seizures, I took her to another vet. Come to find out, her breed has low blood sugar as puppies, and her organs had ended up failing, and we put her to sleep. Would not recommend.

text: They don’t let you go back and see the animals. Seems to me like they are probably living in dirty inhumane conditions. Adoption fees are high and I was forced to use there clinic to spay my cat when I wanted to use my better cheaper vet. They don’t vet the animals until after you adopt them which isn’t healthy for any of the animals there. The staff seemed nice but the environment was dingy and unprofessional. I don’t know how they get business as a vet clinic. I think people only adopt from the shelter so that the animals won’t be put down. Overall it’s a sad place and I appreciate the little help that they try to give to these animals but something better needs to be done with this facility

They have kennels, vans to transport dogs, people who help care for them till transport to new homes . Colony was very ugly wanted huge amount of money for each dog. name: Lisa
text: We took our 3 dogs to Dr. Flowers and he was great with all of them. One of our dogs was very sick and the emergency vets office wanted to charge several thousand dollars to run tests. Dr. Flowers ran one test and got us a diagnosis and treatment that worked. He was also very available to answer our questions and even was willing to come back from his vacation early to take care of our sick dog during closed hours. He is a nice and friendly vet with a lot of care and compassion for our animals. I highly recommend him.

name: Jessica Wetherbee
text: I brought a puppy here last Tuesday that was diagnosed with parvo, they sent us home with medication and she still ended up passing away the next day. Then I had my other puppy start showing symptoms and when I called them they told me to go ahead and bring her in and then about three minutes before I arrived they called me and said that the doctor said he was going to be gone all weekend so he was not going to test her for parvo. They gave her a shot for nausea and send her home after telling me that she didn't look like she had parvo. 3 days later she was still sick so I called them back explain the situation and how dire it was that she got hydrated they told me that because she had an appointment the next day to just wait till the following day to bring her, that would have been four days in on not eating or drinking. I am very disappointed in this place I truly thought that they loved animals but they didn't even give my puppy a chance each time I would call them about her they would call me right back and explain why they could not do whatever it was I was asking. I pay in full every time so it's not even like I have a bill there, this used to be the place I referred everyone too but not anymore. I called central Baldwin and they told me bring her in immediately and now she is being well taken care of!!

The next day we found out she had died over night. Dr. Baxter had no explanation, as to why. She didn't have her stomach pumped, or anything. It seemed liked nothing helpful had really been done in attempting to save her life. I feel as though if we had taken her to another vet, she might still be alive, I would not recommend Animal Health Care to anyone.

text: dr baxter and his staff are some of the best most caring kind and compassionate i know i recently lost my little fur child molly he was compassionate kind and caring and thats hard to find in a doctor of any kind if all doctors were the same his staff take incredible care of the animals that come and those that stay in the kennels. dr baxter has a brilliant mind and hes like an expert so i respect and value his advice it was hard to say good bye but molly had an infected uterus and then infection was causing her body to shut down there was nothing anyone could do i hugged him and he left me to make my decision i couldnt just let my baby suffer so we chose to put her to sleep i was allowed to hold her paw and gaze into her eyes as she left this world and entered the spirit world. he then hugged me and his nurse wrapped my baby in her blanket and i brought her home and buried her under her favorite tree. dr baxter sent me a card that helped my mourning and meant alot he said i did the right thing now tell me what doctor would that other than a truly compassionnate person i give 5 stars

name: Zach Dunn
text: Never in my life would I think I would be writing a bad review about this office, but my previous experience was absolutely terrible. I went in simply for 2 flea and tick pills and the  receptionist refused to sell me the right pill for my dogs weight. She literally told me it was illegal to sell me a flea and tick pill for a dog they haven’t seen 😂 only to find out by another vet office down the road that that was a lie and they then helped me very kindly with what I needed for both dogs and even at a cheaper price without having to see them for visit!!! Never again will I go back mccroy animal clinic

resp.text: Zack, I am very sorry that your experience was not good. We do try to make sure our clients get what they need. We are very cautious about selling flea and tick products for your pets, due to the cautions on the labels about the products adverse reactions. In selling products to customers our priority is to your pets care. If given wrong size for weight of dog it could cause seizures, vomiting or other severe symptoms. it is important to get proper size for your specific dog, i do apologize for any inconvenience you experienced.

text: Doctor Cashion is by far the sweetest man in the vet scene. On 3 different occasions with 3 different animals he has helped save them no questions asked. name: Sabrina Pulliam
text:
My mother leases a place where landowner pulled up , Shot her sisters chihuahua on the property she leases!! Why? No pets. 😳 We are working on legalities of that. But it would seem you don't have many rights. Just a civil suit .
As Chico poses No Threat to anyone.
The bullet went in one leg & out the other. The dog is small, in Shock & Needed HELP!!! Sadly we did not have Ca$h in hand yesterday when going to " the wrong animal hospital" on hwy 129 and Chico was turned away , at 5pm when All vets in area are now closed , without X-ray , without pain med for two bullet wounds , sent home!  where we waited to TRY another vet ....
😇Today my mom took Chico Here 💙🙏🙌🏼 Where she was met by a very compassionate Dr. Who is now Helping Chico. Thank You ,Thank You , Thank You !!! 💝 Yes!! We highly recommend going here, where they obviously care "CARE!" For all gods creatures 😇

text: We were on vacation at Lake Martin and had an emergency with our pup. Dr Mary and the entire staff were professional, caring, and empathetic to our needs, and they helped our little guy feel better in no time. It was reassuring to find great care even though we were so far from home. Highly recommend Kowaliga Whole Health Pet Care.

name: Traci Bray
text: Recently relocated from Missouri to Alabama with three cats in-tow. We sought an integrative practice, and found a fabulous vet in Dr. Mary Battistella. She and staff are caring, responsive and thorough. I must say that with two of the cats prior to coming to Kowaliga, although they had experienced routine vet care, issues had not received the proper diagnosis - Dr. Battistella not only addressed those but came up with simple solutions resulting in healthier, happier cats. We travel up from Montgomery, and the services and care are well-worth the drive.

name: Mary Dunn
text: The staff is so nice and friendly! We were worried that our 4 month old puppy would be scared to death, but he loved it. We were there for 1day daycare. Will certainly be going back!

text: Dr. B and her staff are so professional and caring! They took care of my dog who normally hates going to the vet but when I dropped her off, she was completely comfortable. Dr. B is also one of very few vets who perform ovary-sparing spays in that general vicinity. I couldn’t recommend Kowaliga enough!

text: Gentle and caring with my pet, fees reasonable.  Respectful of appointment time..

name: Stephanie Kelley
text: I love the care that Willow and Holly get there!  And the place is always so clean which can't be said for most vets!  Dr B and the staff are always friendly,  caring and helpful!!

name: Kathy Gunn
text: Love Dr. Mary Battistella (and staff)!  Found her at a very sad and scary time right after the cancer diagnosis of my dog.  She is very knowledgeable and caring, and I'm so grateful I found her at such a very critical time.  After I chose not to do chemotherapy, but rather a more holistic/natural approach, my dog has done exceptionally well and has had a good quality of life under her direction and care, and she is still doing very well two years later!  I'm so very thankful for "Dr. B" and her staff!  Highly recommend!

name: Mike
text: My pets have been patients at Kowaliga Pet Care for five years.  The employees there are attentive, thorough and caring.  Doctor Mary Battistella has specialized knowledge in holistic healing, nutrition and medical practices.  She is very receptive and accommodating to the individual needs of customers and their animals and has unique training and experience to offer solutions beyond traditional veterinary practices and medicine.  There is also a large play room for animals who stay overnight.

name: Daniel Scruggs
text: I had an Emergency situation with my dog being ran over. After being turned down by another vet, these folks took my dog in and did what they could. They were very friendly, compassionate, and professional.

name: Paige Patterson
text: Dr MARY B has a successful practice because she practices from the Heart! Exactly what you want from your vet!

name: Pat Mason
text: Nice vet, nice staff.

name: Sherry Sexton
text: Best vet and very caring, looks at all aspects of health even alternative options

name: Ashlan Pitts
text: Amazing vet and employees! Especially Mrs. Charmin Pitts!

name: Denise Wilkes
text: I was so pleased by the clinic! I called to ask about some symptoms my dog was having and they were able to see him right away. Within 20 minutes they had diagnosed him and prescribed medicine and I am so happy to say he is doing significantly better! The team were very friendly and professional yet you could see their compassion for animals. I am happy we chose them as our service provider!

name: LMFW
text:
I took my pupdog Angel there. Found out she's allergic to fleas. EVEEYBODY that helped me and Angel were amazing. Super friendly and understanding. When I went there my pupdog had chewed all the fur off her butt and back and everywhere. Maybe 3 weeks after the visit my pupdog looks WAYYYY more healthy!! Thank you everyone there! God bless y'all!

P.s I MEAN LOOK AT THIS SMILING PUPDOG AND TELL ME SHE DOESN'T FEEL BETTER! HAHAHA

name: Jessica Sears
text: I took my 14 year old dog to Helena Vet and I gotta say I have never met a better team. Janet came in greeted us and immediately loved on my baby. She was so personable and caring! She spoke to me like a person and not just another number. She truly cared for my baby. I will definitely recommend Helena Vet to all of my friends from now on!!!

name: Rhonda Syphurs
text: Everyone was great! Very friendly  staff.  Loved Dr Barnette.  She went out of her way to explain every aspect of care and treatment. Office atmosphere was very cheerful and helpful. Prices were fair. Good location. Will be back!

name: Marsha Graham
text: Helena Vet Clinic has been taking care of my dog, Lola, for many years. I am very pleased with their service. They are professional and caring. Everything I need to know about my dog’s health is carefully explained to me. I highly recommend them for your pet care needs. Both vets are very knowledgeable and caring. Everyone in the office is so nice and very helpful from the front office to the groomer to the vet techs. My dog and I have had nothing but excellent experiences and wonderful care from Helena Vet Clinic. ❤️

name: Liz Jarrell
text: I moved here from Kentucky I have 12 year old lab name Lukey they were so great with him and me. They explain everything with you and you have questions they are there to help. The staff and doctors are wonderful and friendly they me welcome and like they knew me all our lives. Now my little ole man has cancer and they have been wonderful if I have question or concerns after hours they would respond. Luke and I so blessed for have them in our lives.i highly recommend the staff and doctors. We love you all.

name: Zac Reed
text: I’ve had my golden doodle puppy Mosby in there for his 3rd and 4th rounds of shots and it has been a great experience. Efficient, friendly, helpful, and affordable.

name: Alexa Hargreave
text:
We absolutely LOVE Helena Vet Clinic. Our young cats have had several visits in the last year. Two of the visits were for serious issues. We have only had Dr. Stephens as our doctor the times we've been there. Dr. Stephens is incredible.
How he communicates, and truly loves our babies is priceless. Also, very professional and informative. Reception is always very kind, and patient. These folks truly love our fur babies.

name: Danielle Langdon
text: They have been great both times I have taken my pittie in.  Janet gets us right in on the days I request. They will take great care of your babies. Highly recommend.

name: Susann McWhorter
text: Doctors and staff are TRULY animal lovers! Each person shows compassionate patience with my dog. All are very professional and pleasant! Have used this clinic for years and wouldn’t consider any other!

name: Jenna
text:
Wow! I came here for the first time today with my senior dog. We decided to change vets since we moved to the area. The receptionist, vet tech, and vet were WONDERFUL. I have never been to a place where they showed this much care, patience, and attention to my pet.
The staff is young, but don't let that throw you off. Your fur baby will be very much cared for here. I will absolutely be making this my go-to place.

name: Allison Dunbar
text: The staff was amazing! My dog was injured by another dog and needed to have her jaw wired back together as well at stitches and other treatment. Janet kept me informed throughout the whole process and I rested well knowing Dixie was in good hands! They got her fixed up and she is back home resting well.

name: Anna Jacobs
text: The doctors here are really knowledgeable and caring. It’s obvious they are passionate about taking care of patients. I never feel like I’m being overcharged, and I feel safe bringing my pets here. The reception staff is always incredibly friendly! I think it’s amazing the steps they’re taking to keep themselves and the general public safe by abiding by COVID—19 restrictions and keeping it to curbside service only. Thank you so much for all you guys do!

name: Chad 395
text: Best experience I’ve had at a vet clinic. Making an appointment was quick and easy. The staff was extremely kind and ensured all of my questions and were answered and my pup’s visit was explained thoroughly. Dr Allison was great. Very happy I chose this clinic for my new puppy!

name: MichelleJosesph Booth
text: They called me Scott for some reason I think they have me mixed up with somebody else! My name is Joseph and they did a great job with Saban  our dog. Pretty sure they’re going to remain our vet. The vet was very personable and professional and told us everything she did.

name: Deanna Chandler
text: Dr. Barrett is fantastic! She was super tentative and was extremely thorough. She answered all my questions happily

name: April Mason
text: I have been taking all my fur babies to Helena Vet. Clinic for a good long while.  They treat me and my babies like we are one of their families.  I can't say enough about this place.

name: dustin Norris
text: I have used this clinic for over 20 years and always been extremely pleased with my service and care...to me and my pets. Excellent place to take your fur babies and Excellent people taking care of them.

name: Angel Gilly
text: Polite, professional, knowledgeable, and caring staff provided excellent treatment for my cat Archie Waffles while calming me and thoroughly explaining what was happening and what could and should happen in the future. Highly recommend.

name: Tracey Bowen
text: I brought two of my dogs for nail trims and check a hot spot on the tail of my other dog. The doctors and techs are wonderful! However my one dog, avalanche, had two toes that were bleeding from his nail trim. I’m hoping the medicine I was given for my other dog, Keelin, for her alopecia works for her tail.

name: Marc and Karen Werner
text: We have boarded both of our dogs and most recently had them groomed and their semi annual check ups. 1 of our 2 cats that we rescued was showing symptoms of what we thought was allergies, but turned out to be a virus that was quickly found and treated within only a few minutes. The vet called us and explained everything in detail and answered all the questions that we had about treatment of both cats (since they were rescued together). Pricing is extremely fair and the staff is great!

name: Misty Doles-Busic
text: Very happy to find a veterinarian near our home in Helena that is professional, responsive, and good with our fur babies.

name: Kevin Stober
text: All the people at Helena Veterinary Clinic are professional, friendly, and caring about animals. It's very easy to get an appointment and their hours make it possible to drop off and pick up even if you have a busy work schedule. Their prices are very fair for the quality of service for your pet. They are my go to place for my dog (Coco)!

name: Amanda Counts
text: We changed vets after over 25 years and came to Helena Vet. The office manager helped me with getting out 3 dogs records from our previous vet and arranged our pets visits. During the vet visit the Doctor was on the phone with me the entire time (during COVID) - explained everything including the cost for each test and medication. She answered all of my questions honestly and was great to explain everything. My dog suffers from allergies and previously we were not taken very seriously and told to give large doses of Benadryl even though I explained that does not work for her anymore- it never really did. The most vital part was that she helped me with a treatment plan for my dog. At the end of the visit #1 I was not surprised by the bill- she discussed all that with me as we spoke and #2 I knew the all of the next steps. That was a big deal because where we were before I never had a treatment plan and basically we started over every time we came in. The next day Lucy’s skin was not red, hot, and irritated, she wasn’t chewing on her paws and shaking her head, she wasn’t panting and stressing her and everyone around her out. she was relaxed and calm, and sleeping so peacefully- that hasn’t happened in 8 years for her. The doctor even called me back to go over all of her blood work results. I have never been more impressed with a veterinarian clinic. I am actually a little embarrassed that I continued taking my dogs to the previous vet all these years- had I known the level of service that we were missing and the expertise these doctors offer in comparison to what we had grown accustomed to, I would have moved them many years ago. I look forward to many years of quality care for my dogs.

name: Kay Guess
text: Dr. Barnett and the staff at Helena Veterinary Clinic are always so easy to work with and have such compassion for the animals they care for. They explain everything fully, and you leave knowing exactly how to take care of your pet when you get home. Very thankful to have them in Helena!

name: Samuel Monte
text: My dogs always enjoy the visit and so do I. Doctors and staff do a great job.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your thoughts! We value your feedback & recommendation to other pet owners.

name: Todd Morris
text: The entire staff is extremely professional and caring. My dog loves going there and I highly recommend them.

name: Debra McWilliams
text: Everyone that works there takes such good care of my pups!  Drs, Barnett and Stephens are thorough and explain everything.

name: Samuel Monte
text: My dogs always enjoy the visit and so do I. Doctors and staff do a great job.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your thoughts! We value your feedback & recommendation to other pet owners.

name: Debra McWilliams
text: Everyone that works there takes such good care of my pups!  Drs, Barnett and Stephens are thorough and explain everything.

name: Eric Brown
text: The veterinarian is always very professional and always lets me know any details about my pets visits. The staff there are super kind, would highly recommend others to go to this veterinarian.

name: Kala Bradford
text: We have been taking our sweet fur baby Marlin to this clinic since we got him earlier this year. He's a mischievous little kitten and had to have major surgery this past Friday. I could not be more thankful for this clinic and its amazing, caring and professional staff. I would recommend them to anyone who is looking for a vet for their sweet fur baby. They took care of our Marlin like their own, made sure to keep us updated through the whole process, gave us specific directions for his aftercare and he is now at home healing nicely. We are SO THANKFUL for Helena Vet Clinic and its staff for being so wonderful through this process. You can tell they are all dedicated to making sure all the fur babies are well taken care of!

name: Kelly Benton
text: Everyone was very kind! Doctor Stephens was also very patient with all of my questions and very specific and detailed when he gave me information. I am a new dog owner and had a lot of questions I needed answered for my Doodle Puppy! I also very much like that they will communicate with me via Text Message about whatever I need! Love this place!

name: Chris Parton
text: This is a great clinic! The docs and staff are caring and patient. They have done a great job of adapting to the times during Covid.  Highly recommend!

name: Ashlee Elliott
text: Helena Vet Clinic is above the rest. They have cared for our best buddy since he was 8 weeks old. He is now 7 and has a tremendous amount of allergy issues. They have always been very responsive to his issues, even referring him to a speciality vet when they knew he needed specialized skin treatment. To me that speaks volumes of their professionalism. Dr. Stephens and Dr. Barrett are amazing, as well as Erin and Janet. These are the staff members we interact with most, but every single person we’ve ever encountered there has been like family! We can’t thank them enough for everything they’ve done for caring and treating our Apollo!

name: Donna Robison
text: Very friendly staff, Truly love animals and they take time to make sure every detail is handled.  Available  when you need them.  Definitely would recommend .

name: Jennifer Mamucud
text: Love Helena Vet. They know your pet is family and treat them as such. Very honest and upfront but also compassionate with the bad news.

name: Jennifer Castillo
text: Everyone at Helena Veterinary Clinic was helpful and friendly. They treated Luka as if he was their own. It meant a lot when Christy reached out to ask how Luka was doing after our visit.

name: Donna Robison
text: Very friendly staff, Truly love animals and they take time to make sure every detail is handled.  Available  when you need them.  Definitely would recommend .

name: Stacey Simpson
text: Everyone at Helena Veterinary has just been the best.  We have lived here going on 6 years and have had 5 different pets (4 dogs and a cat) under their care.  Sadly, 2 of our dogs have passed on, but the folks at Helena Vet kept them healthy and happy for as long as possible. Drs. Barnett and Stephens always answer all of our questions, and I've known Karen for as long as we've been using Helena Vet.  She is just so patient and kind and helpful, no matter what is going on.  Janet also has a real heart for animal care and has patiently answered my recent questions about my sweet older dog.  And talk about responsive, they will work with you in any way they can for appointments, medication, whatever the need is. Always return calls. Just can't say enough good things about all of these folks!

name: Joyce Peterson
text: Always a great experience at Helena Vet.  Treat Max like he’s their baby also.

name: Alex Pierce
text: My dog had been attacked.  I pulled into their parking lot. I had no idea they were closed for lunch. They took my dog and saved her!  They managed to keep me updated on every issue.  I can not recommend this practice enough!

name: K Hardy
text: Love Helena Ver! I’ve used them for 20 years! They have always taken great care of my fur babies!! Highly recommend!!

name: Jalie Edmonds
text: Great service, friendly, and take good care of our dog!

name: Rebecca Cannon
text: Dr. Barnett & her team are extremely kind and thoru. They have our girls best interest at heart. Dr. B gave me her time to explain our dogs condition & what the best route to take. Rose, the vet tech, was extremely friendly & clearly loves animals. Even with a mask on, you can tell she was smiling. We will use them again!

name: Pam Malone
text: We are new to Helena. They saw my baby as a work- in, diagnosed her with collapsing trachea and gave me options. She (Theia) is on meds and doing so much better and she’s family to me. I won’t go anywhere else!

name: Ian McDougald
text: My dog wasn’t dying. He got his annual checkups and still isn’t dying. 10/10

name: Kate Kranz
text: First visit with my 7 week old puppy. I was very impressed with the staff. They did a very thorough check on her. They were very friendly and excited to help her. Dr Stephens was very knowledgeable with any question I had about raising a puppy. I have only ever had adult dogs. Thank you so much for all of your help! Can't wait to bring my big baby in next!

name: Arif Patel
text:
The nicest of people work there. It seems like they really like their jobs!
Dr. stevens (maybe stephens) was v helpful and gave great advice with non inexpensive recommendations for our puppies health.

For covid: You call if you have when you get there if you have an appointment.

name: Debbie Weissman
text: We like the availability of the vets on Saturday morning due to our work schedule.

name: Ethan Johnson
text:
I honestly could not imagine taking my baby anywhere else. I moved about an hour away and refuse to go anywhere else.  Any time we need something, they are so quick to respond or get us in.

Both Dr. Stephens and Dr. Barnett always know what my pup needs and they get her fixed up! The whole staff from Janet to Karen and too many more to name, they are the literal best!!

name: shaton green
text: I’ve been to Dr. Barnett twice so far to check on my cat who likes to overgroom and rip open healed wounds. She is always so clear on the best treatment for him and though I don’t like taking him to the vet I know he’s in good hands with her. I recommend Dr. Barnett to anyone in need of a doctor for their fur baby.

name: Debbie Turpin
text: Very prompt on time. Very friendly.  Staff were extremely informative and 8nderstanding.

name: Kelsey
text: I took my pet for his first visit during COVID times. They had drive up service. Registration was easy enough. Sadly, it meant no interaction with the vet. Our previous vet retired and we loved him dearly. The kind of vet that grew up on a farm and loves animals is what I've struggled to find since. I couldn't tell you the vet's name here. My pup was fine when returned to me and is up to date on vaccines so I suppose it's okay.

name: Nathaniel Billings
text: The clinic manager was excellent! Dr. Stephens took so much good care of our little fur baby. I’m happy to drive from Hoover to Helena for Dr. Stephens and his clinic!!!

name: Eric Velez Ruiz
text: I don't even know where to begin explaining how amazing HVC was with our baby. Our poor baby was injured pretty badly requiring oral surgery and a lot of TLC. The staff at HVC was very friendly and so helpful! They took excellent care of our baby Chief and were in contact with us during the entire process making sure we were always in the know and making sure we were able to afford our Pups care. I couldn't be more grateful for having the opportunity to work with such an amazing caring staff from the Hospital Manager Janet being so kind and transparent with us to Dr. Stephens dedicating his after hours time and personally calling us after the surgery to let us know how Chief was doing. Needless to say I would recommend HVC for anyone seeking any care for their beloved pets. I am forever grateful for this Clinic and I can guarantee you it is where my Family and I will be seeking out our pet care!

name: Jordan Singley
text: I had the best experience at Helena Vet. It was my first visit and they were able to work me in that day for our sick kitten. The whole staff was so sweet and compassionate. With all the COVID restrictions, only curbside services were available but the staff did an amazing job relaying information to me with multiple phone calls updating me while I was waiting.

name: amy crowe
text: I have been a client for 15 years. I wouldn’t think of going anywhere else.

name: Jordan Singley
text: I had the best experience at Helena Vet. It was my first visit and they were able to work me in that day for our sick kitten. The whole staff was so sweet and compassionate. With all the COVID restrictions, only curbside services were available but the staff did an amazing job relaying information to me with multiple phone calls updating me while I was waiting.

name: Lisa Kok
text: I’ve had nothing but good experiences at the Helena Animal Clinic and would highly recommend them.

name: Sarah Higgins
text: Great customer service, so kind and caring. Absolutely treated my dog like their own. They got us in as a new patient the next day. I would absolutely recommend this clinic. We are new to the area and Helena Vet will be our choice!!

name: Samantha Lowe
text: Amazing place! Genuine.

name: Emily Westray
text: Love the staff l, and they care about my babies as much as I do!

name: Carla Lopez
text: The entire team was friendly, and professional.  From the initial person who helped me schedule the appointment, & Will, who  thanked me for letting him know my kitty is a very reluctant patient.  Janet, who took the time to go over the medicine/treatment for the kitty.  Dr. Stephens was wonderful about giving me a detailed explanation about what he was doing for my Skittles.  Thank you all,.

name: Thrift_Fitness 1
text: The ladies and gentlemen at Helena Veterinary Clinic are absolutely amazing and trustworthy! The knowledge is far beyond there competition. Janet was able to schedule us in within 24 hours. With the help of DR Stephens and Janet I know my new pup is in great hands!

name: Paige Sweeney
text:
**** I’m editing this as of 4/23/20! My family and “fur” family are still so incredibly impressed with this staff and company: I am going to try to attach the update of Kobe’ the kitten months ago that had eye removal surgery and he is still a happy clam today! Not much I will try to post our Maddie and our Daisy! They LOVE these team members! I love how this team knows it all and is like our family. You are our babies frontlines and we love you!!!  I still recommend this team 100%!! ***

Best decision ever for our fur-babies! We are new to the clinic and they treated us and our kitten like we had been with them for many years. The staff is kind, educated, and pays attention to their customers! I was very impressed with the cleanliness of the clinic and I like that I saw requirements for their clinic internally- such as “flea free clinic!”  The time spent with my kitten after eye surgery made a big deal to me because they were their for us before, during, and after the surgery. Their knowledge in this career is outstanding and I will always go with whatever recommendations they have for our fur family! Would highly recommend! Thanks to the team for becoming a part of our fur family!!!

name: Tyler Elsberry
text: Everyone was so friendly from the moment we stepped into the office until we left!! As a new pet owner, it really gave me reassurance that my pet will be in great hands. This will be my new permanent vet clinic and I will refer everyone I know around the area!

name: J. Terry McCombs
text: The best doctors and staff.  Wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Heather Nelson
text: Dr. Stevens helped me when it was time to let my family dog go over the rainbow bridge. He made me and Luke feel so comfortable and it was obvious how much he and the other staff feel about their patients. They came outside and carried him inside because he legs couldn't work and I couldn't carry him by myself. Thank you so much to the whole staff for helping and loving Luke.

name: Alesha Jefferies
text: Our first visit was great. Dr. Wes was very realistic & also has a teacher way about him, really informing us of the issues & potential remedies for our dog's skin / scratching / licking. We will happily go back!

name: Judy Jones
text: Always caring and professional.  The doctors and staff give great care and followup.

name: tammie jessee
text: They have been taking care of our furry kids for more than 17 years.   Highly recommend!

name: Cassandra Numnum
text: Friendly and helpful staff that took great care of my dog.

name: Linda Gail
text: LOVE the staff.  always there for my pets and provide great service and products

name: Daniel Beard
text: Everyone was so friendly and helpful, and we feel that Winston is in great hands whenever he is being cared for.

name: Jacqui Smith
text: Would be zero stars if available

name: Michelle Rosse
text: Everyone in the office is great. Cissy enjoys visiting for grooming and check ups!

name: Tami Massengale
text: Helena Vet Clinic has been my vet of choice for  12 years, even having moved further away, they are worth the drive.  The entire staff, Karen, Erica, Janet, Dr. Stevens, Dr. Barnett and more are amazing, loving and treat your fur baby as their own.  We have been thru joy and hard loss with this team, and they have been nothing short of family.   You will never regret making Helena Vet Clinic your vet of choice.

name: Eddie Reyes
text: Staff was super helpful and professional. I was in and out. My two girls are doing a whole lot better and I'm extremely thankful for their expertise!

name: Dave Baldwin721
text: One stop shop for all pet needs.  Been bringing our pup there for the past 2 yrs

name: Shannon Nash
text:
Dr. Stephens and his staff took care of my Isaac like he was a part of their family. They loved on him and took great care of him! He is feeling much better! Would recommend them to anyone who wants someone to take great care of their fur babies!!

Update: 2/15/21
Dr Stephen’s and his staff hit it out of the park again. They have been taking care of our newest fur baby, Asher. They are so excited to see him when he comes in and he loves them as well. He got neutered today. They called twice, keeping me updated and loved on him like their own. You couldn’t ask for better!! Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Shannon We are thankful you are part of Helena Veterinary Clinic!  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts and for the kind words.  We appreciate the recommendation to other pet owners!

name: M. Hall
text: This is a very special group of people. We received a condolence card from them soon after the passing of our little jack russell, Fred. Thank you so much Helena Veterinary team.

name: Sharon Snyder
text: Saw Dr. Stephens yesterday he was very helpful with my older cat sassy we were on the same page with her care couldn't ask for anyone to be more kind an nice Tk's again...

name: Kayla Abrams
text:
Absolutely LOVE!! 🤗😻
Dr. Wes Stephens is beyond amazing. 😸
He looks at his fur patients as if they were his very own pets. He does everything he can and does not do like most and automatically say, "put the 😐 animal down" 😔 NO, he is about helping the animals and making sure that they are able to live a long happy healthy life! 🤗 He explains everything at an easy way to understand. He takes one day at a time with them, meaning he doesn't throw everything out all at once; he tries to make sure the animals are very comfortable and at ease. He's a great doctor and I am very confident & very happy to say that he is the best Veterinary Doctor that I have ever EVER dealt with. And I am extremely comfortable leaving my fur kids in his care. I trust all his work and his intentions and opinions. 💯

Dr. Wes Stephens helped to save my fur kid's life and I couldn't be more blessed for Dr. Stephens & his work. He knows exactly what he is doing & what is best for these babies. He will not steer you wrong & he is also very very blunt, meaning, he's not gonna lie to you just because it's something he knows you don't wanna hear. He's gonna tell you rather you like the news or not because your fur babies lives are in his hands and he wants them to be able live long happy healthy lives so he has no choice But to be truthfully blunt. I would rather be faced with the bad news and my fur kid receive the help he/she needs than to be Lord lied to about his/her situation and than my baby die or become worse..

Dr. Wes Stephens is the way to go!

resp.text: Starrrz - THANKS! We appreciate you & your pets being part of our family at Helena Veterinary Clinic!  We are grateful you took the time to share your thoughts & for recommending Helena Veterinary Clinic to other pet owners.

name: Angela Meek
text: It was a great experience all the way around - ease of appt, close location, great staff, and my dog is on the mend.  I’ll be bringing my other dogs by soon!

name: Ashley Lashley
text: The doctor is very helpful and compassionate. Dixie loves going to the vet!

name: April Ray
text:
Vet was super nice. My Big girl didn't even feel the shots.
Wish they had an in house no interest payment plan as I am on disability and paying for a divorce attorney

resp.text: Thank you - we appreciate your feedback about Helena Veterinary Clinic!

name: Terry Tant
text:
1st Visit Helena Vet . Just wanted to go somewhere closer than Hope Animal Clinic.
So glad I did - staff was so accommodating & Dr. Stephens was wonderful. Very Caring & Attentive - gave me several options for treatmeant . Found a New Vet !

resp.text: Terry Welcome to our family at Helena Veterinary Clinic! We look forward to being your partners in your pet's health. Thanks for the feedback about Dr. Stephens & taking the time to share your thoughts.

name: Karissa Juday
text: We are new to the area and needed to find a caring, loving vet to take our animals. Everyone at Helena Veterinary Clinic was so sweet and made our anxious dog feel comfortable. From the front office staff, to the vet tech and Dr. Barnett, everyone was incredibly nice. Dr. Barnett was very knowledgeable about dealing with our dog's allergies and the medicine we were previously prescribed. I highly recommend Helena Vet Clinic, they certainly care about pets and their owners!

resp.text: Karissa - We appreciate you recommending Helena Veterinary Clinic to other pet owners!  Thanks!

name: Kristi Sachs
text: I have been taking dogs to Helena veterinary clinic for 7 years now. They are always very helpful, caring, and friendly. They aways explain what's going on in detail. what options there to help my little ones stay health or get feeling better.

resp.text: Kristi We are thankful you have been part of Helena Veterinary Clinic for all these years!  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts and for the kind words.  We appreciate the recommendation to other pet owners!

name: Cissy McNish
text: Everyone is extremely accommodating and do a great job. We are always well pleased.

name: Lori Ellison
text: We had a great first visit! Dr. Stephens was so knowledgeable and made us feel like we will be in great hands for the future of our pup!

name: Ali Russell
text: Dr. Stephens is the best. We love him and his entire staff.

name: Anna Davis
text:
Helena Veterinary Clinic goes above and beyond to make the experience as peaceful as possible for both the animals and their owners!

I've always felt like vets may love the animals but ignore the people. In fact, I've often felt patronized for asking questions about process, time, and money. But Helena Vet Clinic has never made me feel this way, and I'm so grateful for the service both to me and to my animals!

I have two cats and a dog, and all visits have been above expectations! One of my cats is very temperamental, and their focus the entire time was her safety. They perfectly balanced that with easing my anxiety and giving me plenty of information about making the experience better in the future. Dr. Stephen's was especially attentive, and you can tell how much he loves animals and cares about his clients.

name: JessicaS
text: These people are amazing! Right when you walk in your welcomed in by their office cat and friendly staff. They have been takimg such care of our elderly dog for several years now. When he started to gain and lose weight we were afraid we would lose him. Their vet knew right away what to check for and right after got him on a thyroid pill and a medication for his cushings disease. This vet has gone above and beyond for us. We travel alot and they are able to send the rx to the pharmacy wherever we go. We have even recieved follow up phone calls and they have filled out travel documents needed for our pets. We love this place and feel they love our babies like their own.

text: Did a great job. Friendly staff and nice atmosphere. Next time I travel will board my cat there without hesitation.

text: I love love love this vet. the doctor got on the floor and played with my dog and was so personal with her. I have never seen that in my life from a vet; I loved how all the staff members were playing with her in the other room. I could tell by hearing people call her name and one guy was supposedly wrestling around with her. The staff members are passionate about their job and my animal. This was my first visit to this vet and I fell in love. I am moving to Jacksonville Florida and the doctor knows some doctors down there, she took my number down to call me on the names of vets I could go to. I wish I would have found this clinic earlier, not right before I was moving. If you care about your animals like a child i HIGHLY recommend Helena veterinary clinic.

name: Devon Bissot
text:
This weekend I brought in a 1-year-old weim mix for a simple nail trimming. They brought it to my attention that he was not being cooperative and would need to be sedated. We passed on this at the moment to discuss the $150 fee they were asking.

They did let me know they were able to get his back paws trimmed. Upon returning home, we found that they completely broke one of our dog's back nails. Not just broke, but practically tore it out of the nail bed. It's sitting 90 degrees from where it's supposed to be.

It doesn't take a genius to think this through...if this was the first nail they tried to cut...then of course he acted out the rest of the time. He was hurt!

If it was the last nail they tried to cut and he had been acting so bad to begin with, why didn't they stop?

And...you're telling me you didn't know you hurt him that badly??? How can this happen and you not see it?

Today, he is at another vet who was able to examine him without any sort of sedation. The nail that was injured by Helena Veterinary Clinic will now cost me $200 to fix.

Helena Veterinary Clinic's response to this...it's my fault. I should have practiced with him daily to get him used to having his nails trimmed. The most ignorant comment ever made.

name: Laura Sparks
text: Dr. P was great! Super friendly staff.

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your thoughts - thank you!

resp.text: Jamie Thank you to you & your pets for being part of Helena Veterinary Clinic!  We appreciate that you are sharing your thoughts about Helena Veterinary Clinic.  Thank you for the feedback!

name: Kacey Hydrick
text: You can tell a lot about the character of the doctors and the people who work in an office by the way they react to an emergency situation. We had an emergency with our elderly dog today and when we called the office, they were not compassionate and seemed bothered by the fact we were having an emergency. I don't expect anyone to stop everything when something happens to one of my animals but when an animal is very old and becomes short of breath and semi responsive, you'd at least think the vet office that you call would at least sound like they care even if they don't. In a brief phone call, it was obvious that the person who answered was not concerned, sympathetic, or compassionate. Luckily, there is another office that we were able to contact, be seen, and send our sweet angel to Heaven within an hour. She was almost gone when we called your office and were told you could see us in about 2 hours like it was just some routine vet visit. I hope that the next time an emergency happens and someone needs help from you in an emergency situation that you'll at least pretend to care even if you don't.

name: Rod Riv
text: Ask around. The neighbors tell us that this clinic refused to issue paper prescriptions in order to force you into using their online pharmacy so they can get a kickback. They wouldn't give me a paper prescription either. Their bitter front desk attendent Debra hates men and tosses around the word liar on a whim. Call three times to set up an appt, and they will clip the nails and claim you never asked to see the vet, but charge for boarding. Will run an exhaustive list of tests and generate a 2000.00 balance when those tests are not justified by the prognosis or diagnosis. Other vets claim they can't follow the thought pattern and charts were poorly documented suggesting tests were run to make use of expensive equipment for a return on investment. The crates are kept behind closed doors because the conditions are terrible. They over-medicated my dog by giving her a 3 year shot twice just so they could charge for it. You'll notice Debra pushing those heavily. Same as companion... Same vets...same staff... Stay away. Be warned or you are sure to experience one of these terrible experiences. All this in just two visits.

name: Vicki Latopolski
text: I have used Dr Averette in the past primarily for check-ups and immunizations. I had been there just 2 weeks previous for my dog’s physical, which with the bloodwork I had requested was approximately $350.  I have found Dr. Averette to be thorough, knowledgeable, and kind. This made it especially disappointing to hear when I called the other morning, that despite the fact that my dog had been vomiting for 2 days, there were no appointments for 2 weeks. In my many previous vets’ practices, time was routinely allotted for sick dog visits.  Had I realized that I would be unable to access services on the occasion that my dog was sick or injured, I would not have used this practice for well dog appointments.  I would also add that upon asking if there were any suggestions that may be helpful for my dog,  I was told a flat, no.
